string.name: STR_DIC_TEST03
string.body: Ishalgen Wilderness;A vast, reddish wasteland. What lies on the outer reaches of these lands remains a mystery.

string.name: STR_DIC_FLA03

string.body: Daminu Forest;A green forest to the east of [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA03]. The Elim Daminu is the master of this forest.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_DC1_5
string.body: Temple of Artisans;Here the master craftsmen teach their trades.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_DC1_6
string.body: Legions Board;The centre for Legion administrative affairs in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DC1_3].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_DC1_7
string.body: Prosperity Road;On this road, all the master craftsmen in Pandaemonium come to sell their goods.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_DC1_8
string.body: Triniel Coliseum;The greatest warriors in Asmodae come here to test their skills against each other.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_DC1_9
string.body: Vanahal District;A luxurious district, home to the richest and oldest Daeva families in Pandaemonium.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_DC1_10
string.body: Crandale District;The western district of Pandaemonium, home to taverns and other things.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_DC1_11
string.body: Great Temple;The grandest temple in Asmodae, where the high priests and masters of each class reside.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_DC1_12
string.body: Temple of Knowledge;The central library of Pandaemonium. It is filled with rare books.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_DC1_13
string.body: Airship Dock;Airships coming to [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DC1_0] arrive here.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_DC1_14
string.body: Apellbine Tavern;A tavern in the Crandale District in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DC1_0].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_DC1_15
string.body: Shadow Court;The investigative branch of Pandaemonium's government, with the power to detain and interrogate any suspects.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF2_SZ_OP
string.body: Eltnen Fortress;The fortress that guards Eltnen.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF2_SZ_A1
string.body: Manduri Forest;An old forest occupied by the Manduri.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF2_SZ_A2
string.body: Putrid Mire;This area was once a forest but now it is a contaminated swamp.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF2_SZ_B
string.body: Eiron Desert;Once a fertile area, it has become an uninhabitable desert.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF2_SZ_C1
string.body: Eastern Eracus Desert;Not even a trace of moisture can be found in this deadly desert.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF2_SZ_C2
string.body: Western Eracus Desert;Not even a trace of moisture can be found in this deadly desert.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF2_SZ_C3
string.body: Eracus Temple Cavern;The entrance can be found when heading north along the road west of the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF2_SZ_C2_SUB_1].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF2_SZ_D
string.body: Kyola Temple;A Temple serving as the entrance to the Nobelium.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF2_SZ_E1
string.body: Prellus Wasteland;A fertile land that was reduced to a barren wasteland during the Cataclysm.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF2_SZ_E2
string.body: Lankusis Plateau;Many and various plants grow on this plateau.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF2_SZ_F1
string.body: Ruberein Wastes;A wasteland that has come to be inhabited by many mutant creatures.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF2_SZ_F2
string.body: Mystic Spring of Anathe;A mystic spring next to the Prellus Wasteland. The water here is clean and fresh but the Lepharists control the area.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF2_SZ_G1
string.body: Outpost Ruins;A barren site where a magnificent temple once stood. Now the Caryatids stand watch over its ruins.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF2_SZ_G2
string.body: Drake Habitat;A plain between the Mystic Spring of Anathe and Agairon Village. Many fierce animals live there, including Drakes, Maeki and Tipolids.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF2_SZ_G3
string.body: Mystic Spring of Agairon;A mystic spring in the Agairon region, containing the Water of Life.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF2_SZ_G4
string.body: Geroch Caldera;A volcanic region with lava flows and geysers.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF2_SZ_H
string.body: Kaidan Mine;A mysterious mine used by the Krall.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF2_SZ_I1
string.body: Kuriullu Mountain;A rugged rocky cliff. Many travelers become lost here.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF2_SZ_I2
string.body: Kuriullu Pass;A passage to the west of the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF2_SZ_J].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF2_SZ_J
string.body: Lepharist Bastion;The site that the Lepharist Revolutionaries have chosen to build their base.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF2_SZ_K
string.body: Kaidan Headquarters;The chief garrison of the Kaidan Krall.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF2_SZ_OP_SUB_1
string.body: Eltnen Fortress Battlements;The entrance to the passage leading to Eltnen Fortress.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF2_SZ_A1_SUB_1
string.body: Manduri Stores;The Manduri store their food supplies here.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF2_SZ_A1_SUB_2
string.body: Manduri Village;The home of the Manduri.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF2_SZ_A1_SUB_3
string.body: Fortress Checkpoint;A checkpoint set up to secure the western part of Eltnen.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF2_SZ_C1_SUB_1
string.body: Sataloca's Tomb;The grave of an ancient dragon, to the north of the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF2_SZ_C1]. Priests maintain a vigil over Sataloca's still-beating heart.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF2_SZ_C1_SUB_2
string.body: Desert Scout Camp;The desert camp of a Scout Unit of Daevas.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF2_SZ_C2_SUB_1
string.body: Golden Bough Garrison;The garrison of the Golden Bough Legion who came to investigate the Eracus Temple Cavern. It is in the northwest of the Eracus Desert.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF2_SZ_C2_SUB_2
string.body: Klaw Den;A lair of Klaws.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF2_SZ_C3_SUB_1
string.body: Eracus Temple Cavern Entrance;The entrance to the Eracus Temple Cavern.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF2_SZ_D_SUB_1
string.body: Kyola Temple Entrance;The entrance to the Kyola Temple.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF2_SZ_E1_SUB_1
string.body: Mabangtah's Hideout;The hideout of Mabangtah, a Krall leader in exile.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF2_SZ_E1_SUB_2
string.body: Klaw Nest;A canyon deep inside the Prellus Wasteland. Klaw gatherers, sentries, and soldiers guard Queen Klawterun here.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF2_SZ_E2_SUB_1
string.body: Eltnen Observatory;The observatory that monitors the flow of Aether all over the region of Eltnen.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF2_SZ_E2_SUB_2
string.body: Tigric Village;A village where the strange animals known as 'Tigrics' live.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF2_SZ_G2_SUB_1
string.body: Mystic Spring of Laquepin;A small spring created by the very hand of the Empyrean Lady of Life.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF2_SZ_G3_SUB_1
string.body: Agairon Village;A small village, home to those few who have decided to stay in Eltnen.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF2_SZ_G3_SUB_2
string.body: Caldera Outpost;An outpost of Daevas along the path from [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF2_SZ_G3_SUB_1] to the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF2_SZ_G4].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF2_SZ_I1_SUB_1
string.body: Kuriullu Outpost;A post that watches over Kuriullu Mountain, where deadly accidents frequently occur.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_SensoryArea_Q1336_1
string.body: Morphinos's Trace;The traces of a large herbivore. It may be found in the northern Eracus Desert.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_SensoryArea_Q1336_2
string.body: Dartas Village;A small village to the south of Sataloca's Tomb.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_SensoryArea_Q1336_3
string.body: Gryphu Nest;A Gryphu nest in the south of the Eracus Desert.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_A1
string.body: New Heiron Gate;A fortress built upon the ruins of the ancient Superan civilisation, located high atop Superus Mountain.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_A2
string.body: Heironopolis;An ancient city located between [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_A1] and [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_B]. It is now infested with Ettins.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_B
string.body: Vaizel's Peak;A large mountain near [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_A2].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_001
string.body: Destroyed Guard Tower;An ancient guard tower located at the entrance to the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_B]. Many scholars have been dispatched here to investigate the ancient relics.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_C1
string.body: Poya Jungle;A dense jungle filled with ferocious creatures, just past [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_C2].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_018
string.body: Klawtan's Wallow;An area swarming with Klaws, located to the west of the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_C1].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_C2
string.body: Heiron Pass;The passage between [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_B] with the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_C1]. It is not an easy journey as the road is heavily populated by Ettins.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_C3
string.body: Gojira Nest;Gojira's nest, in the northeast of the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_C1]. Various Frillnecks guard the way to the nest.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_C4
string.body: Tigric Village;A Tigric village in the north of the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_C1]. Their leader, Aeution Burningmane, is trying to expand his influence.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_C5
string.body: Research Centre Overwatch;An observation post watching over the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_003].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_002
string.body: Senea's Campsite;A campsite in the centre of the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_C1]. Ecologist Senea and her researchers are here to study the region.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_003
string.body: Lepharist Research Center;A Lepharist research centre in the north of the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_C1]. It is heavily guarded.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_D1
string.body: Heiron Observatory;An Aetheric Field observatory on the eastern edge of the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_C1].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_D2
string.body: Black Tear Swamp;A swamp southwest of the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_D4]. It's a fascinatingly diverse ecosystem.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_004
string.body: Kishar Observation Post;An observation post you can find by heading south from the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_D2]. A few Guardians have been dispatched to watch over the Kishar Krall.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_D3
string.body: Decayed Grove;A grove east of the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_D2], swarming with Agrints and Rotrons.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_D4
string.body: Gloomy Mire;A swamp to the north of the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_D3]. It is occupied by Trolls.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_D5
string.body: Orton Farm;A den of undead to the northeast of the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_D3].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_D6
string.body: Grey Fog Marshes;A hillock wrapped in mist to the north of the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_D4]. Various swamp creatures ambush travelers here.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_005
string.body: Berone's Ruined House;A deserted house near the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_D4]. Rumour has it that a female ghost appears near the house at night.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_D7
string.body: Deathsong Forest;Once a forest filled with the vitality of the Elim, now corrupted and infested with strange creatures.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_D8
string.body: Medeus Manor West;A manor infested by undead, to the east of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_DTW]. Apparently it was once owned by someone named Medeus.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_D9
string.body: Medeus Manor East;It seems to be east of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_D8]. It is a dangerous place, swarming with various undead workers.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_006
string.body: Manor Cemetery;A cemetery to the north of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_D9]. Small children sneak in here sometimes on dares, but they never return.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_DTW
string.body: Arbolu's Haven;A village in the north of Heiron where Humans and Elim live in harmony. An Aetheric Field created by the Great Holy Tree Trajanus protects it from the undead and the corruption.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_E1
string.body: Kishar Village;A huge Krall village in the south of the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_D2].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_007
string.body: Kunpapa Outpost;A Kishar Krall outpost located inside the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_E1]. The Krall here have been driven mad for some reason.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_008
string.body: Contested Expanse;A battlefield within the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_E1] where the Kishar Krall fight their insane brethren.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_E2
string.body: Indratu Barracks;A Balaur encampent near the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_008].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_E3
string.body: Dragon's Blood Canyon;A canyon to the southeast of the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_E2], leading to the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_009].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_009
string.body: Nute Warrens;A huge cave at the southeast end of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_E3], the centre base for the Balaur invading Heiron.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_010
string.body: Monitor Farm;A Monitor farm located in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_E2].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_011
string.body: Drake Farm;A Drake farm located in the deepest part of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_E3]. It provides a safe place for Drakes to grow up in.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_012
string.body: Island of Eternity;An island said to be somewhere in Heiron, only accessible from an invisible bridge.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_F1
string.body: Patema Ruins;A ruin located to the east of the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_D3]. It has become a gathering place for undead.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_013
string.body: Patema Geyser;A geyser in front of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_FTW]. Water shoots out of it with surprising force.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_F2
string.body: Puitonen Bogs;A marshland to the northeast of the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_F1]. A bewildering variety of swamp species live there.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_014
string.body: Changarnerk Campsite;A Shugo campsite located on the path from [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_F2] to the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_015].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_F3
string.body: The Storm Circle;An area to the east of the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_F2] where an unnatural storm constantly rages.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_015
string.body: Nolantis Ruins;An ancient ruin located to the northeast of the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_F2]. Various undead guard the relics here.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_016
string.body: Medeus Altar;An altar located to the north of the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_015]. It teems with undead of all sorts.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_017
string.body: Drake Temple Ruins;A once-glorious temple located in the northeastern end of the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_015].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_F5
string.body: Stenon Bay;The northeastern coast of Heiron, home to wrecked ships and wandering undead.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_FTW
string.body: Jeiaparan Village;A small fishing village on the eastern end of the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_F1].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_C4_add
string.body: Manduri Valley;A valley in the centre of the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_C1]. Legend has it that a gigantic Manduri lives nearby.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDLF3LP_SZ_2
string.body: Old Library;An old library inside the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDLF3LP_SZ_1].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_DLF3LP_SZ_3
string.body: Lounge;Where the Lepharist Revolutionaries hang out and relax after a long day of heresy and sinister deeds.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDLF3LP_SZ_4
string.body: Bio Experiment Lab;The lab where the Lepharists conduct their unethical experiments.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDLF3LP_SZ_5
string.body: Ormenon's Room;A room in the deepest part of the secret Lepharist laboratory, where the most powerful test subjects are stored.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_C5_1
string.body: Cursed Ancient Temple;An ancient temple with an ancient curse.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_SensoryArea_Q1661A
string.body: Weapon Forge;A smithy behind a four-horned totem in the Kishar Village.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_SensoryArea_Q1661B
string.body: Odium Refinery;Found around a hill on the right after leaving the weapon forge.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_SensoryArea_Q1661C
string.body: Armour Forge;Located right behind the Odium Refinery.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_DF2_SUB_OP
string.body: Morheim Ice Fortress;A fortress located in the north of Morheim. Above the fortress lies an Abyss Gateway.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_DF2_SUB_A1
string.body: Morheim Snow Field;The area near the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF2_SUB_OP]. The field is so cold that only heavily-furred animals like Daru and Ettins live there.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_DF2_SUB_A2
string.body: Patamor Ridge Path;An area in between the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF2_SUB_A1] and the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF2_SUB_A3]. Though right next to the snowfields, it is a warm grassland.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_DF2_SUB_A3
string.body: Patamor Thicket;The forest at the end of the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF2_SUB_A2]. In the centre of the forest live the Elim, a tribe of sentient trees on the edge of extinction.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_DF2_SUB_A4
string.body: Sprigg Habitat;Located in the pass to the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF2_SUB_B1]. Spriggs gather near the stream.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_DF2_SUB_B1
string.body: Salintus Desert;A desert on the edge of the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF2_SUB_A4].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_DF2_SUB_B2
string.body: Kentari Village;A village populated by half-Human beasts to the north of the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF2_SUB_B1].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_DF2_SUB_B3
string.body: Salintus Rise;A slope between the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF2_SUB_B1] and the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF2_SUB_B4]. It is in the Ice Claw Mau's territory.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_DF2_SUB_B4
string.body: Ice Claw Village;A Mau village located in the north of Morheim. Unlike the other Mau who worship the Balaur, the Ice Claw Mau worship an ancient artefact.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_DF2_SUB_C1
string.body: Musphel Gate;The entrance to [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF2_SUB_C2] from the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF2_SUB_A3].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_DF2_SUB_C2
string.body: Mt. Musphel;An active volcano to the southwest of the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF2_SUB_A3]. Few dare to enter this area because of the lava and the ferocious beasts.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_DF2_SUB_C3
string.body: Red Lava Cliff;A cliff leading to the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF2_SUB_C5]. A river of lava flows just below the cliff, so one false step could result in death.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_DF2_SUB_C4
string.body: The Crash Site;An area far to the southeast of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF2_SUB_C2]. Broken pieces of a crashed airship are scattered about.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_DF2_SUB_C5
string.body: Sky Temple of Arkanis;An ancient temple to the west of the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF2_SUB_C3]. The [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF2_SUB_toIDDF2flying] is the only way to get in.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_DF2_SUB_D1
string.body: Alsig Village;A Human village at the centre of Morheim. This village produces most of the Tripeeds used in Asmodae.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_DF2_SUB_D2
string.body: Alsig Crossroad;A crossroad in front of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF2_SUB_D1]. The path to the south leads to the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF2_SUB_E1], and the other leads to the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF2_SUB_D3].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_DF2_SUB_D3
string.body: Halabana Hot Springs;The hot springs to the southeast of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF2_SUB_D1], famous for their healing effects.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_DF2_SUB_D4
string.body: Klaw Habitat;A canyon to the east of the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF2_SUB_D3]. It is said that deep inside the canyon lies a huge Klaw habitat, but nobody knows for sure.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_DF2_SUB_D5
string.body: Lepharist Citadel;The base camp of the Lepharist Revolutionaries, located between the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF2_SUB_D3] and the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF2_SUB_D4].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_DF2_SUB_E1
string.body: Fall Road;A forest on the eastern edge of the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF2_SUB_D2]. The deadly mist released by the trees prevents people from traveling there.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_DF2_SUB_E2
string.body: Altar of the Black Dragon;An altar in the north of the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF2_SUB_E2_2]. Mist Mane shamans perform rituals here.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_DF2_SUB_E3
string.body: Mist Mane Village Entrance;A passage linking the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF2_SUB_E4] and the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF2_SUB_E2_2].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_DF2_SUB_E4
string.body: Mist Mane Village;The home of a Mau tribe in the southwest of Morheim. They worship the Black Dragon.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_DF2_SUB_C1_ID
string.body: Taran's Cavern;A Klaw spawning ground in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF2_SUB_C2]. The cave consists of several chambers where Queen Taran and her Klaws protect their eggs.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_DF2_SUB_toDF2_DFlame
string.body: Fire Temple;A temple in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF2_SUB_C2]. Kromede the Corrupt is imprisoned here.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_DF2_SUB_D5_ID
string.body: Wonshikutz's Laboratory;The laboratory of an insane doctor in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF2_SUB_D5]. It is heavily guarded.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_DF2_SUB_toDF1A
string.body: Road to Altgard;Road to Altgard

string.name: STR_DIC_W_DF2_SUB_toDF3A
string.body: Road to Beluslan;Road to Beluslan

string.name: STR_DIC_W_DF2_SUB_B1_2
string.body: Execution Ground of Deltras;A monument at the centre of the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF2_SUB_B1], built on the site where Deltras, the first Elyos to come to Asmodae, was killed.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_DF2_SUB_A1_1
string.body: Giant Rock Waterfall;A waterfall between the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF2_SUB_A1] and the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF2_SUB_A2]. The beautiful scenery and clean air are conducive to meditation.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_DF2_SUB_A3_1
string.body: Kellan's Cabin;A cabin in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF2_SUB_A3]. Kellan, an old man respected by all of Morheim, lives there.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_DF2_SUB_B1_3
string.body: Fortress of Sorrow;An ancient ruin on a mountain ridge in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF2_SUB_B1]. It is occupied by the lost souls of ancient Elyos.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_DF2_SUB_B3_1
string.body: Munmun Ginseng Plantation;A swamp between the Salintus Rise and the Ice Claw Village. Munmun tribesmen cultivate fresh ginseng in the water.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_DF2_SUB_B4_1
string.body: Karhel's Aetheric Field;An aetheric field that Protector Karhel has raised to protect Artefacts. It is located in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF2_SUB_B4], and only the chosen can enter the aetheric field.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_DF2_SUB_toIDDF2flying
string.body: Sky Temple Entrance;The only passage leading to the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF2_SUB_C5]. The entrance is heavily guarded by magical creatures.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_DF2_SUB_DTW
string.body: Alsig Basin;A volcanic basin, in which lie the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF2_SUB_D1] and the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF2_SUB_D2].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_DF2_SUB_E1_1
string.body: Morheim Observatory;The observatory that monitors the status of the Aetheric Field protecting Morheim. It is located near the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF2_SUB_E1].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_DF2_SUB_E2_1
string.body: Chaikata's Hideout;A hideout deep within the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF2_SUB_E2_2] where the surviving Silver Mane tribesmen have gathered to escape from the Mist Mane Mau.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_DF2_SUB_E2_2
string.body: Silver Mane Village;A Mau village located in the south of Morheim. Most of the tribesmen died when the Mist Mane Tribe invaded.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_DF2_SUB_E4_1
string.body: Nunu Village;A Skurv village near the entrance of the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF2_SUB_E4]. The Nunu cultivate Odella under the protection of the Mist Mane Mau.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_DF2_SUB_E4_2
string.body: Mist Mane Training Ground;The place where the Mist Mane Mau perform military drills. It is in the centre of the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF2_SUB_E4].

string.name: STR_DIC_E_Bellumushill
string.body: Hill of Belemu;A low hill located between the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF2_SUB_A4] and the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF2_SUB_B1].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_DF2_SUB_E4_3
string.body: Kasika's Wood Cave;The hideout of Kasika, the Mist Mane Chieftain. It is located in the deepest part of the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF2_SUB_E4].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDDF2Flying_SUB_1
string.body: Water Room;The first spiral tower of the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDDF2Flying]. A water spirit guards the Magic Power Crystal here.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDDF2Flying_SUB_2
string.body: Wind Room;The second spiral tower of the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDDF2Flying]. A wind spirit guards the Authority Crystal here.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDDF2Flying_SUB_3
string.body: Fire Room;The third spiral tower of the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDDF2Flying]. A fire spirit guards the Flame Crystal here.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_DF2_SUB_A3_2
string.body: Crystal Rise;A passage between the Patamor Thicket and the road to Altgard. Angry spirits have arisen here recently.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDDF2Flying
string.body: Sky Temple Interior;The inside of the Sky Temple of Arkanis, where many spiral towers rise into the air.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_DF2_DFlame
string.body: Fire Temple;A temple in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF2_SUB_C2]. Kromede the Corrupt is imprisoned here.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_DF2_SUB_B1_1
string.body: Desert Garrison;An outpost of Archons in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF2_SUB_B1].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_DF2_SUB_B2_ID
string.body: Octanu's Lair;A cave to the north of the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF2_SUB_B1]. It is a huge Arachna habitat.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_DF2_SUB_B3_2
string.body: Altar of Trial;An altar on a hill to the south of the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF2_SUB_B3].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_AB1_1
string.body: Teminon Landing;The central Elysian base in Reshanta, located in the southeastern part of the lower layer.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_AB1_2
string.body: Teminon Fortress;The fortress atTeminon Landing. The Governor of Reshanta resides here.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_AB1_3
string.body: Primum Landing;The central Asmodian base in Reshanta, located in the northwestern part of the lower layer.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_AB1_4
string.body: Primum Fortress;The fortress at Primum Landing. The Governor of Reshanta resides here.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_AB1_5
string.body: Sulphur Archipelago;A cluster of islands in the northwest of the lower layer of Reshanta. It consists of the Sulphur Fortress, Isle of Roots, Sulphur Flow, Isle of Reproach and others.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_AB1_6
string.body: Isle of Roots;An island in the northwest of the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_5]. A dangerous river of sulphur flows across the island.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_AB1_7
string.body: Sulphur Flow;The northwestern of the four islands that surround the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_13].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_AB1_8
string.body: Western Ridge;An island between the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_7] and the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_9]. It has an artefact called the Tenebrous Cloak.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_AB1_9
string.body: Isle of Reproach;The southwestern of the four islands that surround the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_13].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_AB1_10
string.body: Northern Ridge;A small island between the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_7] and the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_11]. It has an artefact called the Abyssal Aegis.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_AB1_11
string.body: Sulphur Swamp;The northeastern of the four islands that surround the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_13].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_AB1_12
string.body: Eastern Ridge;A small island between the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_11] and the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_15]. It has an artefact called the Daevic Efflux.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_AB1_13
string.body: Sulphur Fortress;A fortress at the heart of the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_5]. Daevas don't like to be posted here because their gear starts to smell like rotten eggs after a while.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_AB1_14
string.body: Southern Ridge;A small island between the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_9] and the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_15]. It has an artefact called the Kerubic Metamorphosis.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_AB1_15
string.body: Isle of Disgrace;The southeastern of the four islands that surround the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_13]. It has a prison camp.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_AB1_16
string.body: Krakon's Dispute;An island in the east of the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_5]. There's a funny story about the name, but this isn't the place to tell it.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_AB1_17
string.body: Wings of Siel Archipelago;A cluster of islands in the southeast of the lower layer of Reshanta. It consists of Siel's Left Wing and Right Wing, the Grave of Steel, the Twilight Battlefield and others.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_AB1_18
string.body: Grave of Steel;An island located far to the east of the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_17].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_AB1_19
string.body: Siel's Right Wing;The island where [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_20] is located.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_AB1_20
string.body: Siel's Eastern Fortress;The fortress located on [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_19]. Generally an average fortress.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_AB1_21
string.body: Heart of Siel;An island located in the centre of the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_17]. It has an artefact called the Abyssal Aegis.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_AB1_22
string.body: Siel's Left Wing;The island where [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_23] is located.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_AB1_23
string.body: Siel's Western Fortress;The fortress located on [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_22]. Generally an average fortress.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_AB1_24
string.body: Island of Exile;An island located below [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_19].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_AB1_25
string.body: Twilight Battlefield;An island located far to the west of the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_17].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_AB1_26
string.body: Forsaken Isle;An island located below [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_22].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_AB1_27
string.body: Bloodburn Reach;A cluster of islands located in the centre of the upper layer of Reshanta. It consists of Miren Island, Krotan Rock, Kysis Isle and others.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_AB1_28
string.body: Drakenwreck;An island to the west of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_29].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_AB1_29
string.body: Miren Island;The island where [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_30] is located. It is located in the east of the Bloodburn Reach.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_AB1_30
string.body: Miren Fortress;The fortress on [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_29]. The staff are said to be somewhat easygoing.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_AB1_31
string.body: Eye of Reshanta Entrance;A huge hole in the centre of the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_27], the entrance to the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_47].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_AB1_32
string.body: Krotan Rock;The island where [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_33] is located. It is located in the west of the Bloodburn Reach.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_AB1_33
string.body: Krotan Refuge;The fortress on [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_32]. The guards here are said to be very spirited warriors.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_AB1_34
string.body: Drakenfall;An island to the north of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_36], where the bones of an ancient dragon lie.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_AB1_35
string.body: Grave of Claws;An island to the south of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_32]. It holds the remains of the Drakanhammer, an ancient weapon from the past.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_AB1_36
string.body: Kysis Isle;The island where [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_37] is located. It is in the south of the Bloodburn Reach.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_AB1_37
string.body: Kysis Fortress;The fortress on [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_36]. The staff here have been reprimanded numerous times for lax morale, but it seems things are improving.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_AB1_38
string.body: Sky Lake;A region in the northeast of the upper layer of Reshanta, which consists of the Sword's Edge, Zephyr Stream, Dryrock, and Lake Asteria.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_AB1_39
string.body: Sword's Edge;An island in the north of the upper layer of Reshanta. Legend has it that a huge sword once wielded by the Balaur Emperor is on the island.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_AB1_40
string.body: Zephyr Stream;A cluster of small floating islands located between [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_39] and [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_42].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_AB1_41
string.body: Dryrock;An island to the south of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_39]. It has a huge altar-like structure made of stone.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_AB1_42
string.body: Lake Asteria;An island at the northeastern end of the upper layer of Reshanta. It retains the verdant grasslands and lakes of old Reshanta.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_AB1_43
string.body: Asteria Fortress;The fortress at scenic [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_42]. All the Elyos Daevas clamor to be stationed here.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_AB1_44
string.body: Soul Stream;A cluster of small floating islands located between [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_42] and the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_57].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_AB1_45
string.body: Divine Floating Island;The area around the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_47].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_AB1_46
string.body: Divine Fortress;The fortress at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_47], the most strategically significant fortress in the Abyss.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_AB1_47
string.body: Eye of Reshanta;The Aetheric sun at the centre of Reshanta. The [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_46] can be found there.

string.body: Ruins of Roah;An island located in the southeast of the upper layer of Reshanta.

string.body: Roah Fortress;The fortress in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_48].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_AB1_50
string.body: Isle of Silence;An island to the southeast of the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_48]. It has an artefact called the Tenebrous Cloak.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_AB1_51
string.body: The Flinders;An island to the southeast of the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_48]. It has an artefact called Aion's Rebuke.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_AB1_52
string.body: Garden of the Dead;A number of floating islands to the south of the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_48]. It is the remains of an ancient garden.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_AB1_53
string.body: The Shattered Temple;A number of floating islands to the east of the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_52]. It is the remains of an ancient temple.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_AB1_54
string.body: Garcikhan Stronghold;A number of floating islands to the east of the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_53]. It is the remains of an ancient fort.

string.body: Western Fissure of Reshanta;Western Fissure of Reshanta

string.body: Western Shard of Latesran;An island in the northeast of Reshanta. It holds a passage that links the upper and lower layers of Reshanta.

string.body: Eastern Fissure of Reshanta;Eastern Fissure of Reshanta

string.body: Latis Plaza;A plaza at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_1]. It has a fortress teleporter and the Eltnen Teleport Tower.

string.body: Teminon Wharf;A port at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_1]. It has a supply depot and the Verteron Teleport Tower.

string.body: Teminon's Leap;A plaza at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_1]. It has the Heiron Teleport Tower.

string.body: Warehouse Construction Site;A construction site a [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_1]. Labourers are working to build a warehouse.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_AB1_Sub_add6
string.body: Primum Training Camp;A training camp at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_3]. It is to the north of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_4].

string.body: Central Red Plaza;A plaza at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_3]. It has a fortress teleporter and the Morheim Teleport Device.

string.body: Primum Plaza;A plaza at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_3]. There you can find the Demolition Legion, who are preparing to march, and the Altgard Teleport Device.

string.body: Primum Wharf;A port at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_3]. It has a supply depot and the Beluslan Teleport Device.

string.body: Nobelium Fragment;A small floating island to the southeast of the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_4]. A Shadow Judge has set up camp here.

string.body: Shade Island;A small island between [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_1] and the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_17].

string.body: Island of Oblivion;A small island with many secrets.

string.body: Red Hasia Scout Post;The Red Hasia Legion's hidden base on the western end of the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_48].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_AB1_Sub_add15
string.body: Mud Falls;The southern end of the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_48]. Mudslides are common here.

string.body: Clocktower Plain;The northeastern region of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_42]. The plain is dotted with waterfalls.

string.body: Asteria Plain;The grassy plain that surrounds [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_43].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_AB1_Sub_add18
string.body: Mirage Cave;The southwestern region of the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_27]. It has a cliff that looks like a cave.

string.body: Solitary Island;A small island between [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_3] and the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_5].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_AB1_Sub_add20
string.body: Leibo Island;A small island at the centre of the lower layer of Reshanta. It is inhabited by Leibos.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_AB1_Sub_add21
string.body: Tigraki Island;An island at the northwestern end of the upper layer of Reshanta. It is the main base of the Tigraki Workshop.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_DF2A_SZ_A
string.body: Settlers Campsite;The campsite where those who came to cultivate the land of Brusthonin settled down.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_DF2A_SZ_B
string.body: Polluted Waste;The region to the north of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF2A_SZ_A]. Once fertile, the land is now polluted.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_DF2A_SZ_C
string.body: Havenjark Farm;A region to the north of the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF2A_SZ_B]. Once a fertile farm, it is now polluted and covered in undead.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_DF2A_SZ_C_1
string.body: Havenjark Cemetery;A public cemetery to the northeast of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF2A_SZ_C]. There's probably some ghosts or undead or something there.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_DF2A_SZ_D
string.body: Vigrid Plains;A plain to the west of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF2A_SZ_C].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF2A_SZ_Start
string.body: Meniherk Excavation Camp;A camp that the Meniherk Excavation Union set up in Theobomos.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF2A_SZ_00
string.body: Crimson Barrens;A region to the south of the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF2A_SZ_Start]. It is dry and barren.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF2A_SZ_01
string.body: The Scorchlands;A region to the east of the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF2A_SZ_00]. It has been burning since the Balaur attacks many centuries ago.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF2A_SZ_02
string.body: Revenge Valley;A region to the west of the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF2A_SZ_00]. Viragos nest here.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF2A_SZ_03
string.body: Theobomos Ruins;A region to the south of the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF2A_SZ_00]. It is dotted with the relics of ancient Atreia.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF2A_SZ_Q1
string.body: Meniherk's First Excavation Site;The ruins of an ancient temple in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF2A_SZ_00], under which lie a great quantity of ancient artefacts.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF2A_SZ_Q2
string.body: Meniherk's Second Excavation Site;The ruins of another ancient temple in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF2A_SZ_00], under which lie a great quantity of ancient artefacts.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF2A_SZ_Q3
string.body: Meniherk's Third Excavation Site;The ruins of an ancient temple in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF2A_SZ_00], under which lie a great quantity of ancient artefacts.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF2A_SZ_C_2
string.body: Hongras' Camp;A camp constructed by Hongras for geographical research.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_STR_DF3_SZ_A
string.body: Beluslan Fortress;A fortress in the Beluslan region. It was destroyed in the Cataclysm, but a powerful artefact froze it in time and stopped it from collapsing.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_STR_DF3_SZ_B
string.body: Black Plains;A black sand plain near [%dic:STR_DIC_W_STR_DF3_SZ_A]. It is dry and desolate.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_STR_DF3_SZ_C1
string.body: Mosbear Snowfield;A habitat of Mosbears to the east of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_STR_DF3_SZ_A]. Spriggs wander nearby.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_STR_DF3_SZ_C2
string.body: Besfer Ghost Village;A village contaminated by the poison of the Dragon Lord Beritra.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_STR_DF3_SZ_C3
string.body: Mahisha's Nest;Drake Queen Mahisha's nest in the Malek fields south of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_STR_DF3_SZ_A].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_STR_DF3_SZ_C4
string.body: Giants Valley;A valley to the north of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_STR_DF3_SZ_C3]. Many strange tales are told about this place.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_STR_DF3_SZ_C5
string.body: Malek Mine;A Lepharist-controlled mine to the south of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_STR_DF3_SZ_A].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_STR_DF3_SZ_C6
string.body: Malek Pass;A passage leading into the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_STR_DF3_SZ_C5].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_STR_DF3_SZ_C7
string.body: Mist Valley;A valley that links [%dic:STR_DIC_W_STR_DF3_SZ_C6] and [%dic:STR_DIC_W_STR_DF3_SZ_D1].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_STR_DF3_SZ_D1
string.body: Kurngalfberg;An ancient city in the southwest of Beluslan. It wa completely frozen by the Dragon Lord Ereshkigal during the Cataclysm.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_STR_DF3_SZ_D2
string.body: Hunibor Ice Gate;A gate that links the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_STR_DF3_SZ_D3] and [%dic:STR_DIC_W_STR_DF3_SZ_D1]. It is completely covered with ice.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_STR_DF3_SZ_D3
string.body: Mamut Graveyard;Located to the south of the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_STR_DF3_SZ_D2]. Mamuts come here to die.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_STR_DF3_SZ_D4
string.body: Frost Spirit Valley;A valley to the east of the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_STR_DF3_SZ_D3]. It is filled with spirits.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_STR_DF3_SZ_D5
string.body: Beluslan's Roof;The region between [%dic:STR_DIC_W_STR_DF3_SZ_D4] and the Red Mane Cavern. It is said to be the tallest point in Asmodae.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_STR_DF3_SZ_E1
string.body: Besfer Refugee Camp;A temporary settlement in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_STR_DF3_SZ_E2]. The refugees here escaped the undead contamination of the nearby villages.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_STR_DF3_SZ_E2
string.body: The Whispering Forest;A forest in the northeast of Beluslan, often covered in thick fogs. Stories say that if you stay there too long, you begin to hear the whisperings of ghosts.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_STR_DF3_SZ_E3
string.body: Anair Ice Lake;A frozen lake to the west of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_STR_DF3_SZ_E4].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_STR_DF3_SZ_E4
string.body: Anair Harbour;An ancient harbour in the northeast of Beluslan, once the busiest port in ancient Atreia.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_STR_DF3_SZ_E5
string.body: Alukina's Palace;A sea in the eastern end of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_STR_DF3_SZ_E2]. The magic of the Seirens allows Humans to breathe water there.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_STR_DF3_SZ_F
string.body: Red Mane Cavern;The home of the Red Mane Mau. Since they allied with the Asmodians, detachments of Archons have been stationed here.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_STR_DF3_SZ_G1
string.body: Fang Troll Encampment;A Troll habitat east of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_STR_DF3_SZ_F].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_STR_DF3_SZ_G2
string.body: Hoarfrost Fortress;A Mau fortress to the east of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_STR_DF3_SZ_F]. It was once the fortress of the Hoarfrost Mau but fell to the Balaur.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_STR_DF3_SZ_G3
string.body: Chaos Brambles;A dark forest in the south of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_STR_DF3_SZ_G2].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_STR_DF3_SZ_G4
string.body: Alquimia Stronghold;The main base of Lepharist Revolutionaries in the southeast of Beluslan. It has a research centre and a training camp.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_STR_DF3_SZ_G5
string.body: Hoarfrost Outpost;The northern region of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_STR_DF3_SZ_G2]. It was once the village of the Hoarfrost Mau but fell to the Balaur.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_STR_DF3_SZ_G6
string.body: Bakarma Barracks;A Balaur garrison you can find in the deep north after passing [%dic:STR_DIC_W_STR_DF3_SZ_G5]. It is swarmed with Drakes, Draconutes, and Nagas.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_STR_DF3_SZ_H
string.body: Draupnir Cave;A Balaur base at the eastern end of Beluslan. A large number of Balaur have infiltrated the cave, including Draconutes and Nagas.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_STR_DF3_SZ_toDF2
string.body: Road to Morheim;A road from Beluslan to Morheim.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_STR_DF3_SZ_C6_2
string.body: Lepharist Port;

string.name: STR_DIC_W_STR_DF3_SZ_G4_2
string.body: Alquimia Castle Gate;A gate that leads into the research centre in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_STR_DF3_SZ_G4]. Only high-ranking or authorized Lepharists can use the gate.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_STR_DF3_SZ_B_2
string.body: Ghost Village Observation Post;A small campsite on the road from [%dic:STR_DIC_W_STR_DF3_SZ_B] to the Besfer Ghost Village. There stay Daevas who have been dispatched to clean up the Undead.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_STR_DF3_SZ_C3_2
string.body: Kidorun's Campsite;A temporary tent in the east of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_STR_DF3_SZ_C4]. There stay Shugo members of the Kidorun Grave Robber Band.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_STR_DF3_SZ_C3_3
string.body: The Lone Cottage;An isolated house in the corner of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_STR_DF3_SZ_C3]. Many awful rumours about the house have been spreading.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_STR_DF3_SZ_C6_3
string.body: Mine Port;A secret port in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_STR_DF3_SZ_C5].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_STR_DF3_SZ_C6_5
string.body: Malek Diggings;A site where a new building is being constructed inside [%dic:STR_DIC_W_STR_DF3_SZ_C5]. Spy Stua has infiltrated the site, disguised as a Lepharist.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_STR_DF3_SZ_C6_6
string.body: Malek Mine Workshop;A stope at the end of a spiral road from [%dic:STR_DIC_W_STR_DF3_SZ_C6].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_STR_DF3_SZ_D1_2
string.body: Camp Kistenian;The outpost of the Daevas of Flame who have been dispatched to restore [%dic:STR_DIC_W_STR_DF3_SZ_D1].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_STR_DF3_SZ_E2_2
string.body: Anair Lighthouse;A lighthouse set up on the hill that overlooks [%dic:STR_DIC_W_STR_DF3_SZ_E4]. The soul of a lighthouse keeper is guarding it alone.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_STR_DF3_SZ_G2_2
string.body: Glacier Peaks;A low hill in front of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_STR_DF3_SZ_G2]. Kurins and Taygas nest on the snow-covered hillock.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_STR_DF3_SZ_G2_3
string.body: Hoarfrost Shelter;Located across the entrance of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_STR_DF3_SZ_G2]. There hide the Hoarfrost Mau who managed to survive the attacks of Balaur.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_STR_DF3_SZ_G2_4
string.body: Chaos Pass;A slope that connects [%dic:STR_DIC_W_STR_DF3_SZ_G2_2] and the Chaos Brambles.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_STR_DF3_SZ_G2_5
string.body: Abandoned Campsite;A small barrack in the corner of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_STR_DF3_SZ_G2_2]. There stays Spy Dewi who has been dispatched to watch the Lepharists.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_STR_DF3_SZ_G2_6
string.body: Alquimia Approach;A recruit training ground of Lepharist Revolutionaries adjacent to [%dic:STR_DIC_W_STR_DF3_SZ_G3] in the southeastern end of Beluslan.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_STR_DF3_SZ_G4_3
string.body: Alquimia Research Center;A research centre deep inside [%dic:STR_DIC_W_STR_DF3_SZ_G4]. It conducts secret experiments with Humans.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_STR_DF3_SZ_G4_4
string.body: Lepharist Barracks;A living quarter of the Lepharists in the north of Alquimia Training Ground.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_STR_DF3_SZ_G4_5
string.body: Alquimia Training Ground;A training ground you can find when you follow the road east of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_STR_DF3_SZ_G2_6]. Trainees of the Sentinel Troop are practicing drills.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_STR_DF3_SZ_G6_2
string.body: Beluslan Observatory;A destroyed Observatory on the cliff that borders [%dic:STR_DIC_W_STR_DF3_SZ_G5] and [%dic:STR_DIC_W_STR_DF3_SZ_G6]. As the Aetheric Field was incapacitated, the Balaur poured in.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_STR_DF3_MS_Britra
string.body: Beritra's Weapon;A huge sword in the centre of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_STR_DF3_SZ_C2]. Pollutants are deteriorating the area near the sword.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_DF3_SZ_D1_3
string.body: The Sacred Orchard;A place where [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Tree_Nomove_Kasadlasil] rests in peace. The Elim considers it a sacred place.

string.name: STR_DIC_SEN_DF4_SensoryArea_Q21069
string.body: Root Hollow;A place in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_SZ_DF4_A2] in Gelkmaros. It is where the wife of Shawster was last seen.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDCromede_Seal_Room
string.body: Temple Vault;A vault used by the Siel's Spear Legion to lock away relics that are too dangerous to let out into the world. It is guarded by Divine Hisen.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDCromede_Prison
string.body: Kaliga Dungeons;A dungeon hidden under the home of Shadow Judge Kaliga. It is full of prisoners who have been wrongfully incarcerated.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDCromede_Boss_Room
string.body: Kaliga Treasury;It is filled with treasures that Judge Kaliga has accumulated through unlawful means. There is supposed to be an entrance somewhere on the first floor.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_DF4_C4_Q1
string.body: Expedition Campsite;A campsite of the brothers [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Itar] and [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Tanar] in the Dragonrest. It is where the windstream that goes through the Dragonrest begins.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_DF4_C1_Q1
string.body: Drana Farm Observation Post;The campsite of the Pandaemonium Expeditionary Force in the Viscum Swamp. It is where the windstream leading to [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF4_SZ_C1_Fire] begins.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_DF2B_SZ_A1
string.body: Sudorville;A settlement area to the north of the Baltasar Hill Village. It used to be a fertile land in the past.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_DF2B_SZ_A2
string.body: Baltasar Cemetery;The cemetery where those who were sacrificed in Brusthonin are buried.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_DF2B_SZ_A2_1
string.body: The Legend Shrine;A site where the members of the Red Sky Legion who died fighting for Brusthonin are buried. It is located in the centre of the Baltasar Cemetery.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_DF2B_SZ_A3
string.body: Wailing Cliffs;An area south of the Baltasar Cemetery. A great battle against the army of Beritra had taken place here in the past.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_DF2B_SZ_A4
string.body: The Golden Coast;The coast to the south of the Wailing Cliffs. It is not treaded by the feet of men.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_DF2B_SZ_A_Town
string.body: Baltasar Hill Village;It was protected from contamination thanks to the power of the holy tree Baltasar.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_DF2B_SZ_B1
string.body: The Eastweald;The eastern region of the Magaro Primeval Forest. It is located on the west of the Baltasar Hill.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_DF2B_SZ_B2
string.body: Nahor Lake;A lake found in the south of The Northweald.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_DF2B_SZ_B2_1
string.body: Old Nahor Castle;An old castle standing on the centre of the Nahor Lake.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_DF2B_SZ_B3
string.body: The Northweald;The western region of the Magaro Primeval Forest.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_DF2B_SZ_B4
string.body: The Saplands;The downstream of Perpet Falls. It is heavily contaminated.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_DF2B_SZ_C1
string.body: Iollu Hills;A hilly region spread on the east of the BuBu Village.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_DF2B_SZ_C2
string.body: Iollu Forest;A forest reached by continuing east from the Iollu Hills. It is free from contamination, and ginseng of good quality grow here.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_DF2B_SZ_C3
string.body: Brohunir;The region to the east of the Iollu Forest, which is the main habitat of the Brohum.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_DF2B_SZ_C_Town
string.body: BuBu Village;A village of the BuBu tribe located northwest of Brusthonin.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_DF2B_SZ_D1
string.body: Carobian Coast;The coast to the west of the BuBu Village. Many cursed creatures wander about here.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_DF2B_SZ_D1_1
string.body: Black Opal Ship Anchorage;The spot in the Carobian Coast where the Black Opal is anchored.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_DF2B_SZ_D2
string.body: The Coastal Pass;A road leading from the Carobian Coast to the Adma Plains.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_DF2B_SZ_D3
string.body: Adma Plains;A canyon leading to the Adma Stronghold. The angry spirits of those who were turned away from the stronghold still linger here.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_DF2B_SZ_E
string.body: Adma Stronghold;A stronghold to the south of the Adma Plains. It is said to be connected to Old Nahor Castle by a secret passage.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_DF2B_SZ_A2_2
string.body: Brusthonin Mithril Mine;An old mine to the northwest of Sudorville.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_DF2B_SZ_C2_1
string.body: Perpet Falls;A clean, clear waterfall located upstream of Iollu Forest.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_DF2B_SZ_A1_1
string.body: Heirnir's Cabin;Heirnir's cabin in Sudorville.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_DF2B_SZ_A2_3
string.body: Shaman's House;An isolated house standing at the eastern end of the Baltasar Cemetery. It is inhabited by the shaman Seznec.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_DF2B_SZ_B3_1
string.body: Decomposed Greens;An area in The Northweald occupied by the Contaminated Elim.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_DF2B_SZ_C1_1
string.body: BuBu Chan's Hideout;An isolated house to the north of the Iollu Hills. BuBu Chan lives here.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_DF2B_SZ_C2_2
string.body: Cayron Hill;A hill in the Iollu Forest. Cayron, a wise Brohum, can be found here.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_DF2B_SZ_D1_2
string.body: Stragglers' Shelter;An area in the Carobian Coast.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_DF2B_SZ_D2_1
string.body: Canyon Scout Post;An area on The Coastal Pass. Archons have been dispatched here to investigate the situation at the Adma Plains.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_SEN_DF2a_SensoryArea_Q4051
string.body: Cayron Hill;A hill in the Iollu Forest. Cayron, a wise Brohum, can be found here.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF2B_SZ_A
string.body: Parched Barrens;The dry desert region east of Observatory Village.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF2B_SZ_A_Town
string.body: Observatory Village;A village built around the Theobomos Observatory.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF2B_SZ_B1
string.body: Northern Latheron Coast;A huge desert found to the east of the Parched Barrens. It was apparently a seaside in the past.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF2B_SZ_B2
string.body: Southern Latheron Coast;Although it is a desert at present, it was apparently a seaside in the past.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF2B_SZ_B3
string.body: Cascade Springs;A dried-up sea to the south of the Southern Latheron Coast.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF2B_SZ_B4
string.body: Alisary Coast;A dried-up sea, located to the west of the Cascade Springs.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF2B_SZ_C1
string.body: Dirmoi Pass;A long canyon passage to the south of Fregion's Flame.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF2B_SZ_C2
string.body: Empyrean Lords Sanctuary;An ancient temple ruin to the south of the Fregion's Flame.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF2B_SZ_C3
string.body: Fregion's Flame;An area to the east of The Stalking Grounds. It still bears the scars from the attacks of the Dragon Lord Fregion.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF2B_SZ_C4
string.body: The Stalking Grounds;An area to the west of Fregion's Flame, laid waste by the Dragon Lord's attacks. Calydons lurk here.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF2B_SZ_C5
string.body: Calydon Village;A Calydon village located on a high cliff in the northwest of Theobomos.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF2B_SZ_C6
string.body: Dirmoi Valley;A deep valley to the east of the Jamanok Inn.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF2B_SZ_C_Town
string.body: Jamanok Inn;An inn built on a hill in The Stalking Grounds. It is run by the beautiful Jamanok.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF2B_SZ_D
string.body: Marla Cave;A cave that can be reached from the Dirmoi Valley. Fugitives and escapees can find a place to hide here.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF2B_SZ_E
string.body: Theobomos Stronghold;The ruins of an enormous stronghold located to the west of the Alisary Coast.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF2B_SZ_B3_1
string.body: Sneeze Crater;A great crater in the Cascade Springs. Inside it is a lush paradise.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF2B_SZ_B4_1
string.body: Port Anangke;The ruins of an old port to the west of the Alisary Coast.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF2B_SZ_C2_1
string.body: Dirmoi Shrine;An ancient temple to the Empyrean Lords.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF2B_SZ_C5_1
string.body: Broken Fang Bridge;The bridge leading to the Calydon Village.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF2B_SZ_D_1
string.body: Stalactite Spring;A spring inside the Marla Cave.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF2B_SZ_B4_2
string.body: Anangke Excavation Camp;A Meniherk Shugo Campsite located near Port Anangke.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF2B_SZ_C2_2
string.body: Stone Mason Tent;A camp in the Dirmoi Shrine.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF2B_SZ_C3_1
string.body: Bounty Hunter Campsite;A bounty hunters' campsite near Fregion's Flame.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF2B_SZ_C4_1
string.body: Black Rock Hot Spring;A hot spring to the north of The Stalking Grounds.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF2B_SZ_C4_2
string.body: Calydon Cavern House;A cavern of Calydons in The Stalking Grounds.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF2B_SZ_D_Exit_00
string.body: Marla Cave Entrance;The entrance to Marla Cave. It can be reached from the Dirmoi Valley.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF2B_SZ_D_Exit_01
string.body: Marla Cave Exit;The exit from Marla Cave. It leads to the Theobomos Stronghold.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF2B_SZ_C5_2
string.body: Gust Valley;A place that can be reached by gliding from the Calydon Village and over a deep valley.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDAb1_MiniCastle_SZ_All
string.body: Nochsana Training Camp;A Balaur training camp in the Abyss, accessible through the [%dic:STR_DIC_OBJ_AB1_Corridor_Q3702].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDAb1_MiniCastle_SZ_A
string.body: Nochsana Training Fortress;A fortress deep inside the Nochsana Training Camp.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDAb1_MiniCastle_SZ_B
string.body: Nochsana Fortress Gate;A huge castle gate protecting the Nochsana Training Fortress.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDLF1_SZ_06
string.body: The Drana Fields;The former Kabarah Strip Mine, converted into a Drana mine by the Anuhart Legion.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_Ab1_SZ_1121_2
string.body: Nobelium Fragment;A small floating island to the south of Primum Landing. Guardians and administration officers with special missions are stationed on the island.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_Ab1_SZ_1111_SUB_G
string.body: Weathered Crag;A small floating island to the north of Teminon Landing. Guardians and administration officers with special missions are stationed on the island.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDLF1_SZ_IDLF1_08
string.body: Timolia Mine;An abandoned mine on the foot of Mt. Timolia. It is currently occupied by the Anuhart Legion, and there is an Abyss Gate leading to the Anuhart Headquarters.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDElim_1F
string.body: Taloc's Roots;An area beneath Taloc where the Elim's roots are exposed.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDElim_1F_Herb
string.body: Garden of Life;A fertile area in Taloc's Roots where a wide a variety of plants grow.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDElim_1F_Pupa
string.body: Muculent Grotto;A contaminated area in the depths of Taloc's Roots.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDElim_1F_Larva
string.body: The Swarmspring;An area inside Taloc's Roots that is now being used as an insect hatchery.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDElim_1F_Food
string.body: The Hive;An enormous hive inside Taloc's Roots with insects swarming out of it.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDElim_1F_Soldier
string.body: Cocooning Chamber;An area deep inside Taloc's Roots. Captured creatures are wriggling inside their cocoons.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDElim_1F_Boss
string.body: Kinquid's Den;A zone beyond the Coocooning Chamber that Kinquid guards.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDElim_2F_Field
string.body: Taloc's Boughs;The uppermost region of Taloc inside the Elim's trunk.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDElim_2F_Food
string.body: Fungalsodden Grove;A part of Taloc's Boughs where moisture allows a variety of plants to grow.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDElim_2F_Egg
string.body: Klawtira Broodlair;A part of Taloc's Boughs the Supraklaw use as a spawning ground.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDElim_2F_Water
string.body: Taloc's Tears;An area where water flows through Taloc's Boughs.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDElim_2F_Hidden
string.body: Dorkin's Nook;A secret hideout in Taloc's Boughs where the Shulack Dorkin lives.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDElim_2F_Boss
string.body: Mosqua's Nest;The uppermost part of Taloc's Boughs where Queen Mosqua nests.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDElim_3F
string.body: Taloc's Heart;An area near the top of Taloc's branches. A fragment of The Tower of Eternity is stuck there.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDElim_3F_Boss
string.body: Blightroot;A region deep within Taloc encroached on by Celestius. It can only be reached after passing through all other regions of Taloc.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF4_SZ_A1
string.body: Calmheart Grove;A forest to the south of the Inggison Illusion Fortress.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF4_SZ_A2
string.body: Phanoe Valley;A valley extending from the Calmheart Grove.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF4_SZ_A2_Caspa
string.body: Taloc's Hill;A hill connected with Taloc's Forest. A fissure separates the two areas.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF4_SZ_A2_DranaFarm
string.body: Hikiron Farm;A Balaur Drana farm located in the Phanoe Valley. It has been destroyed by the Elyos army.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF4_SZ_A3
string.body: Taloc's Forest;A dense forest where the Elim Taloc resides. It can be reached by crossing over Taloc's Hill.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF4_SZ_A4
string.body: Wildheart Grove;A forest to the north of the Inggison Illusion Fortress.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF4_SZ_A4_BigTree
string.body: Obelisk Tree;A region in the Calmheart Grove where the influence of the Obelisk has caused a tree to grow to enormous proportions.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF4_SZ_A5
string.body: Dimaia Fountainhead;A water source located in the north of Inggison. Clear water flows down from a massive cliff.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF4_SZ_B1
string.body: Scar Canyon;A region connecting to the Phanoe Valley. Some traces of Tiamat's power remain.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF4_SZ_B2
string.body: Weeping Valley;A valley near Soteria Sanctuary created by Tiamat's power. Various minerals and ores are exposed to the surface.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF4_SZ_B3
string.body: Wretched Garden;The upper area of Weeping Valley where a fossil of a monstrous bird resides.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF4_SZ_B4
string.body: Mephistis Farm;A Balaur Drana farm located at the centre of Inggison. It serves as a critical location for the Balaur.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF4_SZ_B5
string.body: Sawtooth Valley;A rough canyon extending from the Dimaia Fountainhead.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF4_SZ_B6
string.body: Undirborg;A vast complex at the edge of the Sawtooth Valley. The Dragonbound have moved in there.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF4_SZ_B6_FanaticAltar
string.body: Altar of the Dragon Lord;An altar at the centre of Undirborg. The altar enshrines the Balaur Lords.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF4_SZ_B7
string.body: Inggison Outpost;An outpost the Elyos built in Inggison. It was once a Drana farm, but the Elyos built the outpost over it after driving out the Balaur.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF4_SZ_B7_NeutCave
string.body: Klawnickt's Cave;A Klaw habitat north of the Mephistis Farm. Queen Klawnickt is nesting in the cave.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF4_SZ_B7_Od
string.body: Skysling Canyon;A canyon located to the north of the Klawnickt's Cave where an abnormal phenomenon occurs.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF4_SZ_B8
string.body: Inggison Gravepit;A region that was created when a part of Inggison that connected to the Mephistis Farm sank into the earth.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF4_SZ_C1
string.body: Angrief Ruins;A desiccated area south of the Angrief Wastes.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF4_SZ_C2
string.body: Angrief Wastes;The northern part of the Angrief Ruins tainted by Tiamat's power.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF4_SZ_C3
string.body: Forest of Antiquity;A perilous forest in the north eastern part of Inggison. Even the Balaur dare not enter.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF4_SZ_C3_Dramata
string.body: Dramata Lair;A place deep in the Forest of Antiquity where Dramata lurk.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF4_SZ_C4
string.body: Hanarkand Plains;A vast plain in front of the Temple of Scales.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF4_SZ_C4_Ettin
string.body: Crettin Habitat;An arid and barren area of the Hanarkand Plains that Crettins have taken over.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF4_SZ_C5
string.body: Hanarkand;A city of Drakan located in the Southern Hanarkand Plains in Inggison.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF4_SZ_C5_Od
string.body: Conqueror's Ravine;A canyon to the east of the Hanarkand Plains. Listen closely for the echoes of past battles between the Empyrean Lords and the Balaur Lords.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF4_SZ_C5_Council
string.body: Hanarkand Oracle Chamber;The chamber of the Balaur Oracle located in Central Hanarkand.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_SZ_DF4_A1
string.body: Antagor Battlefield;A plain in front of the Gelkmaros Fortress. The remnants of fierce battles litter the area.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_SZ_DF4_A2
string.body: Antagor Canyon;A deep canyon connected to the area north of Gelkmaros Fortress.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_SZ_DF4_A2_Under
string.body: The Netherworld;A nefarious region located below the Antagor Canyon.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_SZ_DF4_A3
string.body: Gelkmaros Falls;An area home to a cascading waterfall in the north of Antagor Canyon.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_SZ_DF4_A4
string.body: Strigik Forest;A deep forest located north of the Gelkmaros Falls where the Strigik build their nests.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_SZ_DF4_A5
string.body: Dragonspine Rise;An area of rough terrain connected to the southern part of the Antagor Battlefield.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_SZ_DF4_A5_Under
string.body: Sunken Canyon;A canyon located beneath the Dragonspine Rise.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_SZ_DF4_A6
string.body: Krug Basin;A region to the west of the Gelkmaros Falls.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_SZ_DF4_B1
string.body: Nunglark Ruins;An abandoned Sapiens village in Gelkmaros. Its inhabitants fled or were killed when the Balaur attacked, and it is currently occupied by the Naduka Legion.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_SZ_DF4_B2
string.body: Spiritfall Forest;A forest to the west of the Gelkmaros Falls.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_SZ_DF4_B2_Od
string.body: Gallows Run;An area located in the depths of the earth between the Spiritfall Forest and the Krug Basin. Peculiar forces have caused time and space to distort.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_SZ_DF4_B3
string.body: Marayas Scrubland;The northern part of the Marayas Wilderness which lies next to the Rhonnam Refugee Village.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_SZ_DF4_B4
string.body: Lost City of Marayas;The ruins of an ancient city located in the centre of Marayas Wilderness.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_SZ_DF4_B5
string.body: Marayas Wilds;The southern part of the Marayas Wilderness.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_SZ_DF4_B6
string.body: Subterranea;A city of the Dragonbound located some distance south of the Marayas Wilds.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_SZ_DF4_C1
string.body: Viscum Swamp;A swamp in the northernmost part of Gelkmaros inhabited by bizarre mutated creatures.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_SZ_DF4_C2
string.body: Twilight Drana Farm;A Balaur Drana farm located in Eastern Mitrakand. It serves as a critical location for the Balaur.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_SZ_DF4_C3
string.body: Vorgaltem Battlefield;A vast plain near the centre of Gelkmaros where the Vorgaltem Citadel and the Crimson Temple stand.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_SZ_DF4_C4
string.body: Dragonrest;A region located to the south of the Vorgaltem Battlefield where the corpses of hundreds of Balaur litter the ground.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_SZ_DF4_C5
string.body: Petralith Canyon;A region to the west of the Dragonrest where a colossal battle took place.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_SZ_DF4_C6
string.body: Earthfang Gorge;A desolate region surrounded by rough canyons. Rumour has it a huge Dramata lies dormant at the end of the path.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_SZ_DF4_D1
string.body: The Great Fissure;An enormous fissure that cuts through the centre of Gelkmaros.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_SZ_DF4_D1_Od
string.body: Azure Gully;An arid region located to the north of The Great Fissure.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_SZ_DF4_B3_Castle
string.body: Gelkmaros Defence Base;A fortress the Asmodians built to serve as a base of operations in Gelkmaros.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF4_SZ_OP
string.body: Inggison Illusion Fortress;A fortress that Empyrean Lord Kaisinel created with illusion magic.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF4_SZ_A5_Shulack
string.body: Rokoros Village;An area surrounded by cliffs above the Dimaia Fountainhead that serves as a hidden home for the Shulacks.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF4_SZ_B_Town
string.body: Soteria Sanctuary;A village built on top of the ruins located at the end of the Scar Canyon. Both Elyos and Reian tribesmen visit the village.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF4_SZ_C1_DragonFly
string.body: Jotun Ruins;The ruins of an ancient civilization located in the Angrief Ruins.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF4_SZ_Sky
string.body: Skies of Inggison;The sky of Inggison.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_ZONE_NAME_IDCatacombs
string.body: Beshmundir Temple;A Balaur Temple deep in Silentera Canyon. Inside the temple lie tombs for the most revered Balaur. The temple entrances are located in Silentera Canyon, in the New Start Legion Headquarters in Signia, and in the Temple of Oblivion in Vengar.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDCatacombs_SZ_A1
string.body: Beshmundir's Walks;The entrances to Beshmundir Temple. They are located in Silentera Canyon, in the New Start Legion Headquarters in Signia, and in the Temple of Oblivion in Vengar.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDCatacombs_SZ_A2
string.body: Gate of Repose;The front gate of the Beshmundir Temple.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDCatacombs_SZ_A3
string.body: Watcher's Nexus;An area where lost souls from the Beshmundir Temple often manifest.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDCatacombs_SZ_A4
string.body: Oracular Chamber;A room located to the east of the Gate of Repose. Rumour has it the Altar of Soul Invocation located within can summon Faithful Respondent Utra.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDCatacombs_SZ_A5
string.body: Hideout;A hiding place.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDCatacombs_SZ_B1
string.body: Crypt of the Vanquished;The site where Stormwing's men were massacred. The undead now roam the area.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDCatacombs_SZ_B2
string.body: Vault of the Conquerors;A crypt where wandering Drakan souls roam.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDCatacombs_SZ_B3
string.body: Acheron Mire;An infernal swamp where Macunbello tortures the souls of lost Daeva.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDCatacombs_SZ_B4
string.body: Macunbello's Refuge;A place beneath the Beshmundir Temple where Macunbello is hatching a wicked plot.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDCatacombs_SZ_B5
string.body: Twisting Passage;A passage connecting the Gate of Repose to the Hero's Vault.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDCatacombs_SZ_B6
string.body: Hero's Vault;A room lined with catacombs and decorated with statues of heroic Drakan.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDCatacombs_SZ_C
string.body: Forgotten Storeroom;A deserted room that served as a warehouse when the Beshmundir Temple was first built.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDCatacombs_SZ_D
string.body: Garden of the Dead;A cemetery inside the Beshmundir Temple.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDCatacombs_SZ_D1
string.body: Grotto of the Altar;The southeastern area of the Garden of the Dead where there is a large altar.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDCatacombs_SZ_D2
string.body: Blue Flame Incinerator;The northeastern part of the Garden of the Dead where Flarestorm is imprisoned.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDCatacombs_SZ_D3
string.body: Undying Obelisk;A pavilion in the centre of the Garden of the Dead where the Nightshade Clan lurks.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDCatacombs_SZ_D4
string.body: Garden of the Entombed;A garden lined with the tombs of Balaur heroes.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDCatacombs_SZ_E1
string.body: Courtyard of Eternity;The entrance to the Temple of Eternity.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDCatacombs_SZ_E2
string.body: Meditation Chamber;Located on the second floor of the Temple of Eternity.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDCatacombs_SZ_E3
string.body: Contemplation Chamber;Located on the second floor of the Temple of Eternity.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDCatacombs_SZ_E4
string.body: Supplication Chamber;Located on the second floor of the Temple of Eternity.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDCatacombs_SZ_E5
string.body: Petition Chamber;Located on the second floor of the Temple of Eternity.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDCatacombs_SZ_E6
string.body: Ritual Chamber;A room where the ritual to seal Stormwing is being held. Isbariya the Resolute presides over the ritual.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDCatacombs_SZ_E7
string.body: Prison of Ice;A room where Stormwing is imprisoned.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF4_SZ_2011_A
string.body: Temple of Scales;A fortress built by the Balaur in the Angrief Ruins of Inggison.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF4_SZ_2021_A
string.body: Altar of Avarice;A fortress built by the Balaur located to the east of the Angrief Wastes.

string.body: Vorgaltem Citadel;A fortress built by the Balaur located in the Vorgaltem Battlefield in Gelkmaros.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_DF4_SZ_3021_A
string.body: Crimson Temple;A fortress built by the Balaur located in the Vorgaltem Battlefield in Gelkmaros.

string.body: Hanarkand Protection Altar;An Altar of Protection inside [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF4_SZ_2011_A]. The Guardian General appears at this altar when the fortress becomes vulnerable.

string.body: Altar of Transcendence;An island floating over the Dragonrest.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_SZ_DF4_A1_Q3
string.body: Dredgion Crash Site;A region in the Antagor Battlefield where a Dredgion crashed.

string.body: Marayas Northgate;An Asmodian gate built in the Marayas Scrubland.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_SZ_DF4_B5_Gate_1
string.body: Marayas Southgate;An Asmodian gate built in the Marayas Wilds.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_SZ_DF4_B5_Gate_2
string.body: Vorgaltem Gate;An Asmodian gate guarding the path to the Vorgaltem Battlefield.

string.body: Hanarkand Gate;An Elyos gate guarding the path to the Hanarkand Plains.

string.body: Sawtooth Valley Gate;An Elyos gate built in the Sawtooth Valley.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF4_SZ_B7_Gate
string.body: Angrief Gate;An Elyos gate guarding the path to the Angrief Ruins.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_SZ_DF4_C2_3
string.body: Klawtiar's Maze;A Klaw nest under the Twilight Drana Farm where Queen Klawtiar resides.

string.name: STR_DIC_QW_LF4_SZ_A1_Q1
string.body: Obelisk Valley;A valley under the influence of an Obelisk installed in the Calmheart Forest.

string.name: STR_DIC_QW_LF4_SZ_A5_Q2
string.body: Dimaia Fountainfall;The waterfall at the Dimaia Fountainhead.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF4_SZ_A5_Q1
string.body: Shulack Kitchen;A communal kitchen of Shulacks in the Rokoros Village.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_SZ_DF4_C2_2
string.body: Mitrakand;A city of Balaur to the north of the Vorgaltem Battlefield in Gelkmaros.

string.name: STR_DIC_SEN_LF4_SensoryArea_Q36500
string.body: Rokoros Village Entrance;Refers to the entrance to [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF4_SZ_A5_Q1].

string.name: STR_DIC_SEN_LF4_SensoryArea_Q36506
string.body: Undirborg Loot Storage;A storehouse in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF4_SZ_B6] that is used for storing looted items.

string.name: STR_DIC_SEN_LF4_SensoryArea_Q36512
string.body: Forest of Antiquity Relics;A place in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF4_SZ_C3] where [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LF4_DayQ_DrakanFi_55_An] is thought to be hiding.

string.name: STR_DIC_SEN_DF4_SensoryArea_Q46500
string.body: Northern End of Strigik Forest;Refers to the northernmost part of the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_SZ_DF4_A4].

string.name: STR_DIC_SEN_DF4_SensoryArea_Q46506
string.body: Subterranea Plunder Storage;A storehouse in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_SZ_DF4_B6] that is used for storing plundered items.

string.name: STR_DIC_SEN_DF4_SensoryArea_Q46512
string.body: Southern End of Viscum Swamp;A heavily contaminated area in the southern part of the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_SZ_DF4_C1].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF4_SZ_B8_NepilimCave
string.body: Abandoned Jotun Studio;An ancient Jotun workshop located at the Collapsed Cliff in the Inggison Gravepit. It can only be reached by using a windstream.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF4_SZ_B3_Cellatu
string.body: Greatshade Valley;A narrow valley inhabited by Cellatus. It is upstream of the Wretched Garden Waterfall. It can be reached by using a geyser.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_DF4_SZ_C5_Lab
string.body: Naduka Biolab;A Balaur research facility located deep in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_SZ_DF4_C5].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_DF4_SZ_B5_Ruin
string.body: Highpass Ruins;A temple site found at the top of the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_SZ_DF4_B5] cliff. It can be reached by using a windstream.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_DF4_SZ_C1_Cave
string.body: Genesis Cave;A habitat of Seafoams in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_SZ_DF4_C1]. It can be entered by using a geyser.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_DF4_SZ_C1_Fire
string.body: Mitrakand Summit;An area in the sky over the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_SZ_DF4_C2]. It is guarded by Mitrakand beacon soldiers and can be reached by using a windstream.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_SZ_DF4_Tw
string.body: Rhonnam Refugee Village;A temporary residence prepared by the Reian tribesman Rhonnam in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_SZ_DF4_B2] for refugees from the Nunglark Ruins.
