string.name: STR_DIC_W_ZONE_NAME_IDElemental_1
string.body: Elementis Forest;An enchanted forest in the northwest of Sarpan that is protected by the Luminous Sapling.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_ZONE_NAME_IDElemental_2
string.body: Argent Manor;A cliffside mansion in Elementis Forest. It was built by the sorcerer Davlin so that she could research and build Golems in close proximity to the Luminous Sapling.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_idf4re_drana_SZ_Stage_02_1
string.body: Drana Production Lab;A research centre and refinery at the Esoterrace. It processes Drana to produce Dratamin, Surkina, and other materials.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_idf4re_drana_SZ_Stage_03_2
string.body: Esoterrace Secret Laboratory;Surama's secret laboratory beneath the Esterrace. It connects to the Air Conditioning Room by a Secret Passage.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_idf4re_drana_SZ_Stage_02_4
string.body: Laboratory Air Conditioning Room;Not just for cooling air. This room houses the controls for the Drana Esoterrace and the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_idf4re_drana_SZ_Stage_02_1].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_idf4re_drana_SZ_Stage_01_2
string.body: Drana Esoterrace;The Esoterrace's Drana production region. It has improved both the quality and output of Drana by using Elm.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_idf4re_drana_SZ_Stage_03_5
string.body: Esoterrace Bio Lab;An experimental laboratory beneath the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_idf4re_drana_SZ_Stage_03_2].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_Arena_L_Lobby
string.body: Kaisinel Academy;A training area run by Lord Kaisinel. It was set up for Daevas to provide reinforcements for Elyos troops. You can get there using the [%dic:STR_DIC_OBJ_LC1_LC2_TELEPORT] in Sanctum.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_Arena_D_Lobby
string.body: Marchutan Priory;A training area run by Lord Marchutan. It was set up for Daevas to provide reinforcements for Asmodian troops. You can get there using the [%dic:STR_DIC_OBJ_DC1_DC2_TELEPORT] in Pandaemonium.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDStation_SZ_Station
string.body: Aturam Sky Fortress;It was constructed by Dredgion Soldiers by order of the Shulacks.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDStation_SZ_Start
string.body: Aturam Sky Fortress;Aturam Sky Fortress

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDStation_SZ_NPC
string.body: Elevator;Elevator

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDStation_SZ_Lobby
string.body: Central Corridor;Central Corridor

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDStation_SZ_01_A
string.body: Sky Fortress Warehouse Zone;A zone that houses weapons and supplies for the Fortress. You can get there by turning left from the Central Corridor.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDStation_SZ_01_B_1
string.body: Material Supply Depot;Material Supply Depot

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDStation_SZ_01_B_2
string.body: Weapon Depot;Weapon Depot

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDStation_SZ_01_Named
string.body: Talon Laboratory;Talon Laboratory

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDStation_SZ_02_A
string.body: Dredgion Fabrication Zone;The Dredgion control systems are located in this part of the Aturam Sky Fortress. You can reach it using the [%dic:STR_DIC_N_IDStation_Teleport_toLobby].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDStation_SZ_02_Named
string.body: Supervisor's Workshop;Supervisor's Workshop

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDStation_SZ_03_A
string.body: Airship Dock;Airship Dock

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDStation_SZ_03_B
string.body: Sky Fortress Command Center;The heart of Aturam Sky Fortress, where they Drakan fortress commanders are located. You'll have to take the Steam Tachysphere to reach the Command Center.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDStation_SZ_03_C_1
string.body: Drakan Operations Room;Drakan Operations Room

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDStation_SZ_03_C_2
string.body: Drakan Control Room;Drakan Control Room

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDStation_SZ_03_Named
string.body: Ashunatal's Ready Room;Ashunatal's Ready Room

string.name: STR_DIC_W_ZONE_NAME_IDYun
string.body: Rentus Base;This covert Reian training base and weapons smithy was built perilously close to Balaur territory.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDYun_SZ_2
string.body: Sparring Grounds;A training ground for Reian warriors to practice and hone their skills.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDYun_SZ_5
string.body: Siel's Forge;Ahead of the battle with the Balaur, this forge produces powerful weapons.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDYun_SZ_3
string.body: Residential Zone;The Barracks and housing for Rentus Base troops.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDRaksha_Whole
string.body: Raksang;An ancient Balaur dungeon where the dragon Raksha has been sealed for centuries. It is now accessible through Arsa's Corridor.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDRaksha_2F
string.body: Terror's Vault;An old crypt used as a dungeon in Raksang. Ethereal blue light marks the path from Raksang Dungeon Chasm to the Vault's entrance.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDRaksha_3F
string.body: Torment's Forge;A dungeon in Raksang that is choked with endless flames. Molten red light marks the path from the Flight Area to the Vault's entrance.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDRaksha_4F
string.body: Hellpath;The gate to the Hellpath is in Raksang, at the bottom of the Raksang Depths.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4b_SZ_OP_A4
string.body: Garnon's Secret Chamber;Access to Garnon's secret room is usually allowed by summons only.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4b_SZ_T1_S8
string.body: Heart of Fissure;A source of Tiamat's power guarded by the Dragon Lord's avatar, Fissure Incarnate.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4b_SZ_T2_S10
string.body: Heart of Gravity;A source of Tiamat's power guarded by the Dragon Lord's avatar, Gravity Incarnate.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4b_SZ_T3_S7
string.body: Heart of Wrath;A source of Tiamat's power guarded by the Dragon Lord's avatar, Wrath Incarnate.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4b_SZ_T4_S6
string.body: Heart of Petrification;A source of Tiamat's power guarded by the Dragon Lord's avatar, Petrification Incarnate.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4b_SZ_T2_S12
string.body: Watcher's Hill;A hill overlooking the Heart of Gravity that provides a clear view of the Heart and is useful as an observation post.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4b_SZ_T1_S9
string.body: Outcrop Overlook;A outcrop above the Heart of Fissure that offers an unobstructed view of the Heart and is useful for reconnaisance.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4b_SZ_T3_A6
string.body: Wrath Vent;An area destabilized by its proximity to the Power of Wrath. The creatures in this area seem to be affected by the volcanic steam that vents nearby.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4b_SZ_T2_A6
string.body: Gravity Well;An area affected by the Gravity Power. The creatures in this area are twisted by proximity to Tiamat's power.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDRaksha_ItemUseArea_Q28703
string.body: Magma Flow;Seething magma that builds up in the bottom of Raksang.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_OP
string.body: Kamar;The magnificent Reian capital city in central [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_sarpan_main], built in defiance of the constant threat from Tiamat and his Balaur servants.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_OP_01
string.body: Sarpan Capitol;The main council chamber of the Reian Elders, where Kahrun and his senior officals discuss the future of the Reian Tribe.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_OP_02
string.body: Griffoen Boarding Site;This chamber allows access to the Elyos airship, Griffoen.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_OP_03
string.body: Habrok Boarding Site;This chamber allows access to the Asmodian airship, Habrok.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_OP_04
string.body: Main Conference Hall;A chamber in the Sarpan Capitol used for the Reian Elders' private councils.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_OP_05
string.body: Peace Square;A place in the centre of Kamar. The beautiful fountain is the pride of Kamar.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_OP_06
string.body: Kahrun Guard Headquarters;This legion, commanded by Kahrun Guard Brigade General [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Kutos], is headquartered in the northeast of the Reian capital, Kamar.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_OP_07
string.body: Siel's Spear Headquarters;Headquartered in east Kamar, this legion is commanded by Elder [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Raffaele].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_OP_08
string.body: Wisdom Library;A large amount of books containing the wisdom of the Reians.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_OP_09
string.body: Jotun Research Library;A library compiling all Reian knowledge regarding the Jotun, built over many years by the researcher [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Acheron].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_OP_10
string.body: Spero Residential Parish;The residential district of Kamar, where the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_OP_17] is located.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_OP_11
string.body: Kamena Development District;An area of Kamar under rapid development as directed by [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Salomone].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_OP_12
string.body: Kamar Dungeon;A prison dug deep beneath the city of Kamar. Its entrance is north of Lamina Bazaar.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_OP_15
string.body: Lamina Bazaar;Kamar's busy commercial district, populated by traders and merchants of all kinds.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_OP_16
string.body: Room of Relativity;This room is what you make of it.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_OP_17
string.body: Bivarus Tavern;A famously rowdy tavern in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_OP_10].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_OP_18
string.body: Siel's Spear Temple;A temple built in honour of Lady Siel, whose noble self-sacrifice during the Cataclysm saved Atreia from total destruction.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_OP_19
string.body: Griffoen;The Elyos fleet flagship, currently docked in Kamar. You can reach the Griffoen through a Warship Crew or Warship Teleport Statue.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_OP_20
string.body: Habrok;The Asmodian flagship, currently docked in Kamar. You can reach the Habrok through a Warship Crew or Warship Teleport Statue.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_OP_21
string.body: Mephitic Caverns;The twisting caverns dug by burrowing Klaw. One has recently broken through a wall in the Kamar Dungeon.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_A1
string.body: Kamar Outskirts;The lands surrounding the Reian capital. These areas are mostly forested, save for the desert fronting the eastern city entrance.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_A1_01
string.body: Kamar Road Outpost;A guard post watching the road leading to Kamar's west entrance.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_A1_02
string.body: Refugee Camp;A temporary camp housing those fleeing Balaur attack and seeking the safety of the Reian capital. It is in the desert of the Kamar Outskirts, near the southeast city walls.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_A1_03
string.body: Southern Guardian's Seal;A Guardian Seal in the north of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_D]. The [%dic:STR_DIC_E_guardstone_Q41256] here prevents Tiamat's power from destroying this region of Sarpan.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_A1_04
string.body: Redclaw Steppe;This hilly area between Kamar and the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_A4_01] is especially dangerous at night.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_A2
string.body: Trepone Forest;This northern Sarpan forest was once razed to build Drana plantations, but has since returned to its natural state.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_A2_01
string.body: Garldar Village;A Reian village in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_A2], which escaped the Dredgion bombardment.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_A2_02
string.body: Menin Village;A Reian village in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_A2] completely decimated by Dredgion bombings.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_A2_03
string.body: Luman Village;A Reian village razed by Dredgion bombings and overrun with Shulack and Drakan forces.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_A2_04
string.body: Dredgion Bombing Area;A region of the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_A2] heavily bombed by Balaur Dredgions.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_A2_05
string.body: Nalotia's Cabin;A cabin in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_A2] where the Herb Gatherer [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Nalotia] lives.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_A2_06
string.body: Solace Cavern;An isolated, well-protected cave that seems to have served as some kind of shelter in the past, though its occupants are long gone.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_A2_07
string.body: Wildflower Field;A field crowded with wild flowers, including the [%dic:STR_DIC_N_LDF4a_Dandelion_Big].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_A3
string.body: Cucutero Grove;An ancient forest spreading across southwest Sarpan that is sacred to the [%dic:STR_DIC_E_ldf4a_Owllau_fam] Strigik.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_A3_01
string.body: Western Guardian's Seal;The [%dic:STR_DIC_E_guardstone_Q41256] here prevents Tiamat's power from destroying the western region of Sarpan. It is well-fortified.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_A3_02
string.body: Hunter's Blind;This overlook commands an unbroken view of the [%dic:STR_DIC_E_ldf4a_Owllau_fam]'s territory.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_A3_03
string.body: Urugugu Village;The village of the warrior Strigik [%dic:STR_DIC_E_ldf4a_Owllau_fam], in the south of the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_A3].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_A3_04
string.body: Urugugu Garrison;An encampment of the most elite and powerful [%dic:STR_DIC_E_ldf4a_Owllau_fam] warriors.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_A3_05
string.body: Ashishav's Nest;A sacred tree named in honour of the [%dic:STR_DIC_E_ldf4a_Owllau_fam] patron of battle.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_A3_08
string.body: Chief Uliuru's Territory;Land claimed by the Chief Uliuru.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_A4_01
string.body: Eastern Guardian's Seal;The [%dic:STR_DIC_E_guardstone_Q41256] sited above Redclaw Steppe prevents Tiamat's power from destroying the eastern region of Sarpan.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_A4_02
string.body: Ancestor's Shrine;An altar in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_A4_03] dedicated to the Calydon cult of the ancestors.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_A4_03
string.body: Humnaz Territory;Land in the eastern Sarpan deserts claimed by the [%dic:STR_DIC_E_LDF4a_calydon_fam].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_A4_04
string.body: Humnaz Garrison;An encampment of elite [%dic:STR_DIC_E_LDF4a_calydon_fam] warriors.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_A4_05
string.body: Haridoo's Lodge;The lodge of the Humnaz Tribe's ruler, [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_A4_Calydonchief_Nmd_57_Ah], who has kept control of the tribe for an unprecedented length of time.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_A4_06
string.body: Warrior's Shrine;An altar in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_A4_04] dedicated to the Calydon warrior's cult.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_A4_07
string.body: Yearling's Shrine;An altar in the south of the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_A4_04] dedicated to the Calydon cult of future warriors.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_A4_08
string.body: Disguised Humnaz Outpost;A Reian observation post on the fringes of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_A4_03], disguised beneath a Calydon tent.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_B1
string.body: Anaz Forest;A dense, lush forest in the west of Sarpan.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_B1_01
string.body: Herbalist's Campsite;A camp north of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_B1].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_B1_02
string.body: Yocaris' Retreat;The temporary camp of the powerful Reian sorcerer [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Yocios].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_B1_05
string.body: Aponos Brohum Village;A Brohum village built on the ruins of many past Brohum civilizations.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_B2
string.body: Jotari Wastes;This trecherous desert spreads across northwest Sarpan. It contains many unexplored ruins.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_B2_01
string.body: Jotun Research Expedition;The campsite for the Jotun relics excavation team, led by [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Linacroft].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_B2_02
string.body: Thebadim Altar;This ancient holy site is so badly degraded that it's not clear what it was built in honour of, though the Jotun Research Expedition hopes they'll learn more during its excavation.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_B2_03
string.body: Ruined Jotun Watchtower;Ruins in the north Jotari Wastes thoroughly looted by the [%dic:STR_DIC_E_shulak_nightshadowfam].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_B2_04
string.body: Ruined Jotun Citadel;These ruins in the east Jotari Wastes have already been looted of artefacts by the [%dic:STR_DIC_E_shulak_nightshadowfam].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_B2_05
string.body: Nightshade Camp;The [%dic:STR_DIC_E_shulak_nightshadowfam] camp in these tents.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_B2_06
string.body: Cleanup Squad Camp;A Hushblade Legionary encampment.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_B2_07
string.body: Cleanup Squad Camp;A Fatebound Legionary encampment.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_B2_08
string.body: Crumbling Petralith;The remains of a Petralith destroyed by the Balaur. Old stories claim that a Windstream once originated here.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_B2_09
string.body: Debarim Petralith Studio;A huge Jotun petralith forge in ancient caverns deep beneath the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_B2].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_B2_10
string.body: Jotari Sanctuary Ruins;An ancient, ruined temple that floats above the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_B2_09].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_C1
string.body: Destroyed Guardian's Seal;When the [%dic:STR_DIC_E_guardstone_Q41256] here was destroyed, the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_C1_000] ripped the area into a nightmarish landscape.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_C1_01
string.body: Twisted Land Research Expedition;The Twisted Land Research Group uses this camp as its base while investigating the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_C1_000]. It is in one of the deepest fissures in the Great Fissure.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_C1_02
string.body: Twisted Land Outpost;A temporary camp for the team researching the area annihilated by the Destroyed Guardian's Seal.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_C1_05
string.body: Ellesra Cave;A huge cave brimming with Energy of Greater Aether. Its entrance is hidden in the west of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_C1].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_C2
string.body: Satrakand;The ruins of a fortress where remnants of the Satra Legion are encamped.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_C2_01
string.body: Southeast Guardian's Seal;The [%dic:STR_DIC_E_guardstone_Q41256] here prevents Tiamat's power from destroying the area north of Satrakand.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_D
string.body: Sabat's End;A valley that contains the only transport lines from Kamar into Tiamaranta, making it strategically vital. The remains of its namesake are fossilized into the western cliffs of the End.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_D_01
string.body: Hushblade Garrison;A Hushblade Legionary garrison protecting [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_D] from Balaur forces.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_D_02
string.body: Fatebound Garrison;A Fatebound Legionary garrison protecting [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_D] from Balaur forces.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_D_03
string.body: Sabat's End Cemetary;Tiamat's power has disturbed the spirits resting in this formerly-peaceful Reian cemetary.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_D_04
string.body: Rancora North Gate;The north end of the heavily-fortified Sarpan entrance to Tiamaranta.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_ZONE_NAME_IDLDF4A_Lehpar
string.body: Israphel's Space;The Empyrean Lord [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Israphel] is waiting here.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_ZONE_NAME_IDLDF4A
string.body: Protector's Realm;A hidden realm conjured by Protector [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Oriatia] as a retreat from the tumultuous Reian world.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_B1_08
string.body: Macori Hill;A hill in the Anaz Forest populated by Marconnuts.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4b_SZ_T1_A1
string.body: Triumph Gate;Close to the Rancora Fortress

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4b_SZ_T1_A2
string.body: Adora Desert;A brutal waste of desolate land north of Tiamaranta's Eye.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4b_SZ_T1_A3
string.body: Balaur Cavalry Base;A Balaur training base near Rancora Fortress in northeast Tiamaranta, where the Balaur Vasharti Legion train their Pagati.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4b_SZ_T1_A4
string.body: Fissure Barrens;A region rent and twisted by the power emanating from the Heart of Fissure. It is pockmarked with craters.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4b_SZ_T1_A5
string.body: Fissure's Limits;The northwest corner of Tiamaranta, leading from the Fissure Barrens into the Heart of Fissure.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4b_SZ_T1_S1
string.body: Prago Outpost;A Tiamaranta Expeditionary outpost assigned to monitor the Fissure Barrens south of Rancora Fortress.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4b_SZ_T1_S2
string.body: Adora Supply Depot;A depot in the Adora Desert that supplies all Reian forces in Tiamaranta.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4b_SZ_T1_S3
string.body: Siege Troop Garrison;;A Tiamaranta Expeditionary garrison for forces laying siege to Tiamaranta's Eye.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4b_SZ_T1_S4
string.body: Scout Outpost;;A Reian post overlooking the Balaur Cavalry Base.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4b_SZ_T1_S5
string.body: Faultline Research Expedition;Base camp for the team investigating the Fissure Barrens.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4b_SZ_T1_S6
string.body: Giant Crater;The largest crater in the Fissure Barrens, at the centre of which is an enormous Gap Rift.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4b_SZ_T1_S7
string.body: Heart of Fissure Watchpost;A post assigned to monitor the Heart of Fissure.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4b_SZ_T2_A1
string.body: Lunatic's Rift;A region in southwest Tiamaranta severely distorted by the power from the Heart of Gravity. It is scattered with Gap and Temporal Rifts.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4b_SZ_T2_A2
string.body: Edendell;A mysterious and protected valley in western Tiamaranta. It is populated by unique enchanted creatures.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4b_SZ_T2_A3
string.body: Traitor's Hideout;A village in which Reian traitors live. Situated north of the Land of Gravity.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4b_SZ_T2_A4
string.body: Naduka Legion Garrison;The Naduka Legion headquarters on the west side of Tiamaranta's Eye.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4b_SZ_T2_A5

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4b_SZ_T3_A1
string.body: Fields of Fire;A region in northeast Tiamaranta diminated by a large active volcano. The region is highly affected by the power from the Heart of Wrath.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4b_SZ_T3_A2
string.body: Steam Springs;An area south of the Fields of Fire that features hot springs and volcanic vents.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4b_SZ_T3_A3
string.body: Avad Village;An abandoned mining village taken over by Dragonbound. It is southeast of the Steam Springs.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4b_SZ_T3_A4
string.body: Basrasa Legion Garrison;The Basrasa Legion headquarters on the east side of Tiamaranta's Eye.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4b_SZ_T3_A5
string.body: Wrath's Limits;The northeast corner of Tiamaranta, leading from the Fields of Fire to the Heart of Wrath.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4b_SZ_T3_S1
string.body: Cindercone Outpost;A Reian post in the Fields of Fire, in the ruins of a temple built into the side of Mount Wrath.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4b_SZ_T3_S2
string.body: Volcanic Research Expedition;Base camp for the team investigating the Fields of Fire.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4b_SZ_T3_S3
string.body: Steam Springs Research Expedition;Base camp for the research team assigned to investigate the Steam Springs.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4b_SZ_T3_S4
string.body: Mount Wrath;An active volcano that dominates the landscape of northeast Tiamaranta.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4b_SZ_T3_S5
string.body: East Eye Guard Post;A Tiamaranta Expeditionary post monitoring the Basrasa Legion in Tiamaranta's Eye.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4b_SZ_T3_S6
string.body: Heart of Wrath Watchpost;An outpost monitoring the Heart of Wrath.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4b_SZ_T4_A1
string.body: Calcified Tundra;A desolate region in southeast Tiamaranta that's affected by proximity to the Heart of Petrification.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4b_SZ_T4_A2
string.body: Siel's Temple Ruins;Ruins are all that is left of this grand, dignified temple built by ancient Reians to honour the Empyrean Lady Siel.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4b_SZ_T4_A3
string.body: Satra Legion Garrison;The Satra Legion headquarters in the south of Tiamaranta's Eye.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4b_SZ_T4_A4
string.body: Area of the source of Petrification;The outer area of the source of petrification.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4b_SZ_T4_S1
string.body: Petro Outpost;A Reian legion camp south of Tiamaranta's Eye. It's set up in the ruins of an old fortress.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4b_SZ_T4_S2
string.body: Archeological Expedition;Base camp for the Relics Expedition sent to excavate the ruins of the Destroyed Siel Temple.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4b_SZ_T4_S3
string.body: Destroyed Siel Temple;All that is left of a grand, dignified temple built by ancient Reians to honour the Empyrean Lady Siel.

string.body: Satra Legion Guard Post;A post monitoring the Satra Legion

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4b_SZ_T4_S5
string.body: Heart of Petrification Watchpost;A post assigned to monitor the Heart of Petrification.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4b_SZ_C1
string.body: Gurriki Swamp;A swampy valley that winds between the Land of Fissure and the Heart of Wrath Area and is inhabited by a colony of Gurriki.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4b_SZ_C1_A2
string.body: Gurriki Grotto;A cavern deep in the Gurriki Swamp.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4b_SZ_C1_S1
string.body: Gurrik Tree;A tangled tree where Gurriki build their huts.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4b_SZ_C1_S2
string.body: Ioran's Camp;The campsite where Ioran, a Gurriki researcher, compiles her research.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4b_SZ_C1_S3
string.body: Tatar's Hideout;Tatar is hidden here.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4b_SZ_C2
string.body: Quartz Forest;An icy forest in the south of Tiamaranta.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4b_SZ_C2_A1
string.body: Enos Forest;A frigid forest with dense Enos populations.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4b_SZ_C2_A2
string.body: Blue Quartz Valley;A ravine streaked with veins of brilliant blue quartz.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4b_SZ_C2_A3
string.body: Lapialus Mineral Veins;A canyon cut through with striated veins of pure, valuable, and useful minerals.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4b_SZ_C2_S1
string.body: Black Cloud Camp;A Black Cloud Merchant campsite in the far south of Tiamaranta.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4b_SZ_C2_S2
string.body: Blacksmith's Camp;Campsite of the blacksmith Shumaron, which is convenient to the resources offered by the Lapialus Mineral Veins.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4b_SZ_C3
string.body: Basilika Cavern;A gate beneath Tiamaranta's Eye.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4b_SZ_OP

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4b_SZ_OP_A1
string.body: Hushblade Headquarters;The Elyos base in the Rancora Fortress.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4b_SZ_OP_A2

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4b_SZ_OP_A3
string.body: Accord Square;The main central square in Rancora Fortress.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4b_SZ_T1_S10
string.body: Siege Troop Command Center;The administrative centre for commanding and supplying Reian siege forces.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4b_SZ_C2_S4
string.body: Ativas Cave;The cave where the giant Ativas Crystalline creature lives.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4b_SZ_T1_S11
string.body: Small Crater;Craters scattered around the Fissure Barrens.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4b_SZ_T1_S12
string.body: Scout Post Defence Line;A defensive line near the Scout Outpost that's protected by Aether mines.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4b_SZ_T2_S13
string.body: Stone Arch Bridge;A stone arch leading to the Gravity Fault that can transport you to Danitur's Lookout.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4b_SZ_T3_S9
string.body: Head's Hideout;The hideout of the Dragonbound leader

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4b_SZ_C2_S5
string.body: Enos Brooding Grounds;A nesting ground in the centre of the Enos Forest where the Enos raise their young.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4b_SZ_C2_S6
string.body: Lapialus Mineral Lake;A lake in the Lapialus Mineral Veings. It contains a high concentration of rare minerals that can crystallize items soaked in the waters of the lake.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4b_SZ_C3_S2
string.body: Basilika Passage;The entrance to Basilika Cavern, accessible through the Satra Legion Garrison. You must show the Kunati's Banner to pass through.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4b_SZ_T2_S14
string.body: Traitor's House;This would be a good place to set a Marker Stone in the Traitor's Camp.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4b_SZ_T2_S15
string.body: Magic's Root;A corner of Edendell where magical powers converge so powerfully that they are palpable.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_A2_08
string.body: Refugee Waystation;A camp in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_A2] where refugees can regain their strength, regroup, and attempt to find missing loved ones.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4B_ItemUseArea_Q41558A
string.body: Traitor's House;This would be a good place to set a Marker Stone in the Traitor's Camp.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_C1_000
string.body: The Great Fissure;A ravine torn through the land beneath the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_C1].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_housing_SZ_house_001
string.body: Tezz's House;Tezz is regarded as a tastemaker in Oriel, so her home is open as a design showcase. Tezz is often gone, so Kanen looks after the property.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_housing_DF_house_001
string.body: Tezz's House;Tezz is regarded as a tastemaker in Pernon, so her home is open as a design showcase. Tezz is often gone, so Katenon looks after the property.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_TDown_ItemUseArea_Q12031A
string.body: Shrouded Road;Use the Sounding Gem here to find the path to Tiamat's stronghold.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_A09_pvp
string.body: Hero's Discus;A combat ring in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_A3_05] that the Urugugu use for training and duels. [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_A3_Owllauchief_Nmd_57_Ah]'s power overrides Kahrun's here, and therefore fighting is allowed.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_A1_05_public1
string.body: Dredgion Incursion Zone 1;An area in the ruins southeast of the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_A1] that comes under attack from the [%dic:STR_DIC_E_LDF4a_Dredgion].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_A2_09_public2
string.body: Dredgion Incursion Zone 2;An area in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_A2_04] that comes under attack by the [%dic:STR_DIC_E_LDF4a_Dredgion].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_B2_14_public3
string.body: Dredgion Incursion Zone 3;A part of the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_B2_04] that comes under attack by the [%dic:STR_DIC_E_LDF4a_Dredgion].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_C2_07_public4
string.body: Dredgion Incursion Zone 4;The [%dic:STR_DIC_E_LDF4a_Dredgion] is moored above this part of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_C2].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_OP_22_a
string.body: Kamar Dungeon Entrance;Located near the northern city walls, this path leads down into the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_OP_12].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_Housing_lf_personal_agora
string.body: Oriel Plaza;This airy plaza in the centre of Oriel is always bustling with residents, craftspeople, performers, shoppers and merchants.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_Housing_df_personal_agora
string.body: Pernon Plaza;This airy plaza in the centre of Pernon is always bustling with residents, craftspeople, performers, shoppers and merchants.

string.body: Loot Loading Bay;A space for stacking the loot inside the [%dic:STR_DIC_E_ZONE_NAME_IDTiamat_Reward].

string.body: Hoard Watchroom;A room guarded by [%dic:STR_DIC_M_4BReward_Named_001].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDTiamat_Reward_SZ_small_rewardroom
string.body: Discard Pile;A space for stacking low-grade relics inside the [%dic:STR_DIC_E_ZONE_NAME_IDTiamat_Reward].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDTiamat_Reward_SZ_artifactroom
string.body: Guardian Artefact Control Room;A space for controlling the guarding artefact that is watching the [%dic:STR_DIC_E_ZONE_NAME_IDTiamat_Reward].'

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDTiamat_Reward_SZ_Finalnamedroom
string.body: War Hoard;A space filled with Satra Legion's war funds. Giniurash, a violent dragon, is guarding the site.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDTiamat_SZ_R1
string.body: Tiamat's Fortress;A fortress that holds the main army of the Tiamat Legion. The Elyos can reach it via the [%dic:STR_DIC_OBJ_IDTiamat_1_F5_FOBJ_Entrance] in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF5_SZ_ID_03], the Asmodians via the [%dic:STR_DIC_OBJ_IDTiamat_1_F5_FOBJ_Entrance_Dark] in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF5_SZ_ID_03].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDTiamat_SZ_R2
string.body: Fortress Access Route;A long corridor leading from the entrance of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDTiamat_SZ_R1] all the way to the inner fortress door.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDTiamat_SZ_R3
string.body: Inner Fortress Door;The final facility for protecting the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDTiamat_SZ_R1] from intruders. It is guarded by [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDTiamat_DrakanGuardian_Named_60_Ah].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDTiamat_SZ_S1
string.body: Central Corridor inside the Fortress;The heart of Tiamat's Fortress which leads everywhere inside the fortress. A [%dic:STR_DIC_N_IDTiamat_FOBJ_Teleport_S6], the use of which is unknown, is stood here.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDTiamat_SZ_S2
string.body: Balaur Technical Research Institute;Located in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDTiamat_SZ_R1]. A number biological experiments are being conducted here by using Drana.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDTiamat_SZ_S2_1
string.body: Banakin's Laboratory;A laboratory where [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDTiamat_ShulackScientist_60_Ae] works.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDTiamat_SZ_S3
string.body: Dredgion Control Room;Located within[%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDTiamat_SZ_R1] and is used to control the Chantra Dredgion and the Terath Dredgion.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDTiamat_SZ_S3_1
string.body: Gravity Control Research Lab;[%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDTiamat_Chantra_Named_60_Ah] is conducting gravity control experiments at this location. It is located within [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDTiamat_SZ_R1].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDTiamat_SZ_S3_2
string.body: Dredgion Command Centre;[%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDTiamat_Sardha_Named_60_Ah] commands the Dredgion from here. Located within [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDTiamat_SZ_R1].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDTiamat_SZ_S4
string.body: Military Control Area;Used to look after and monitor the military facilities in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDTiamat_SZ_R1].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDTiamat_SZ_S4_1
string.body: Prison Camp of Eternity;Located within [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDTiamat_SZ_R1]. All sorts of felons are incarcerated here.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDTiamat_SZ_S4_2
string.body: Room of Penance;IDTiamat

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDTiamat_SZ_S4_3
string.body: Bridge of the Rakshaka Legion;[%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDTiamat_Rakshaka_Named_60_Ah] can be found here. It is located in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDTiamat_SZ_R1].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDTiamat_SZ_S5
string.body: Barbarian Way;It is located inside of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDTiamat_SZ_R1] and stretches all the way to the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDTiamat_SZ_S1].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDTiamat_SZ_S5_1
string.body: Bridge of the Tahabata Legion;[%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDTiamat_Tahabata_Named_60_Ah] can be found here. It is located in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDTiamat_SZ_R1].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDTiamat_SZ_S6
string.body: Garden of the Dragon Lords;A secret garden of the Dragon Lords. It can be accessed via the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDTiamat_SZ_S1] and the [%dic:STR_DIC_N_IDTiamat_FOBJ_Teleport_S6].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDTiamat_SZ_S6_1
string.body: Shrine of Glory;Located in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDTiamat_SZ_S6]. Workplace of distributors who are looking after valuable combat equipment.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDTiamat_SZ_T1
string.body: Tiamat's Hideout;The location of Dragon Lord Tiamat. The Elyos can access it using the [%dic:STR_DIC_OBJ_IDTiamat_2_F5_FOBJ_Entrance], and the Asmodians using the [%dic:STR_DIC_OBJ_IDTiamat_2_F5_FOBJ_Entrance_Dark].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDTiamat_SZ_T6
string.body: Bloody Throne;Can be accessed via the [%dic:STR_DIC_E_IDTiamat_solo_entrance_L] within Tiamaranta's Eye.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_Tiamat_down_start_L
string.body: Elyos' Gateway;The Elyos' outpost in Tiamaranta's Eye

string.name: STR_DIC_W_Tiamat_down_start_D
string.body: Asmodian's Gateway;The Asmodians' outpost in Tiamaranta's Eye

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDTiamat_SZ_T6_D
string.body: Bloody Throne;Can be accessed via the [%dic:STR_DIC_E_IDTiamat_solo_entrance_D] within Tiamaranta's Eye.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDAb1_MiniCastle_SZ_L
string.body: Nochsana Training Camp;A training camp located in a small, confined Abyss. It is possible to get there by means of the [%dic:STR_DIC_OBJ_AB1_Corridor_Q3702] or with the help of [%dic:STR_DIC_N_LF2_Rogun].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDAb1_MiniCastle_SZ_D
string.body: Nochsana Training Camp;A training camp located in a small, confined Abyss. It is possible to get there via the [%dic:STR_DIC_OBJ_AB1_Corridor_Q4702] or with the help of [%dic:STR_DIC_N_DF2_Barlack].

string.body: Shattered Splinterpath;Shattered Splinterpath

string.body: Pazuzu's Remains;Pazuzu's Remains

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDAbRe_Core_02_SZ_C
string.body: The Storm Cave;A dangerous place where, due to the unpredictable currents, it often rains down Aether Fragments. It is located near the entrance to the shattered Abyssal Splinter.

string.body: Spiral Corridor;Spiral Corridor

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDAbRe_Core_02_SZ_G2
string.body: Shattered Splintercore;Shattered Splintercore

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDUnderpassRe_SZ
string.body: Corridor of Betrayal;A corridor located north of the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_ZONE_NAME_Underpass]. Relics for the betrayal of Brigade General Rakshaka were hidden here.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDLDF5b_TD
string.body: Steel Wall Bastion;Fortress that represents the gate to South Katalam. The Beritra Army wants to attack it in order to invade Katalam. The Steel Wall Bastion is therefore constantly under threat.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDDF2flying_event01
string.body: Shugo Imperial Tomb;The Krall and the Strigik are after the treasures, and are recklessly raiding the tomb. [%dic:STR_DIC_N_IDEvent01_In_NPC] can take you there.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDDF2flying_event01_Room
string.body: Treasure Chamber;A chamber where the treasures of the ancient Empire are hidden. Can only be accessed by sacrificing the [%dic:STR_DIC_I_WORLD_WRAP_EVENT_MAP_TOTAL] on the sacred altar.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF5b_SZ_E2
string.body: Bright Town;Located in South Katalam, it is the southernmost village in the Goldrinyerk Autonomous District. Shulack pirates often loiter around here.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDShulackShip_02_SZ_1F
string.body: Landing Stage of the Steel Rose;The landing stage of the pirate ship Steel Rose, which is commanded by captain Rumakiki. [%dic:STR_DIC_N_IDShulack_Rose_Ent_1F_E] of the Elyos and [%dic:STR_DIC_N_IDShulack_Rose_Ent_1FD_E] of the Asmodians know the way there.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDShulackShip_02_SZ_2F
string.body: Cabin of the Steel Rose;The cabin of the pirate ship Steel Rose, which is commanded by captain Rumakiki. [%dic:STR_DIC_N_IDShulack_Rose_Ent_2F_E] of the Elyos and [%dic:STR_DIC_N_IDShulack_Rose_Ent_2FD_E] of the Asmodians know the way there.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDShulackShip_02_SZ_3F
string.body: Deck of the Steel Rose;The deck of the pirate ship Steel Rose, which is commanded by captain Rumakiki. [%dic:STR_DIC_N_IDShulack_Rose_Ent_3F_E] of the Elyos and [%dic:STR_DIC_N_IDShulack_Rose_Ent_3FD_E] of the Asmodians know the way there.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDShulackShip_02
string.body: Steel Rose;A massive Shulack pirate ship, which is commanded by captain Rumakiki. It is anchored somewhere off the coast of North Katalam.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF5b_SZ_A1
string.body: Freezing Plateau;A plateau to the west of the Eremion Ramparts in South Katalam.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF5b_SZ_A1_CV
string.body: Crystal Cave;A cave located between the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5b_SZ_A1] and the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5b_SZ_A2].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF5b_SZ_A2
string.body: Eremion South Gate;A gate connecting North and South Katalam.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF5b_SZ_A3
string.body: Tundra of Despair;A snowy field to the east of the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5b_SZ_A2].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF5b_SZ_A4
string.body: Nevilim Plateau;A plateau to the south of the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5b_SZ_A2] where Nevilim roam around.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF5b_SZ_B1
string.body: Red Fang Occupied Territory;A region occupied by the Red Fang Underground Troop led by the Asmodian, Phon. Borders the contaminated area.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF5b_SZ_B2
string.body: Contaminated Region;A region contaminated by Balaur experiments. It is a swamp that is located between the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5b_SZ_A4] and the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5b_SZ_B1].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF5b_SZ_B3
string.body: Site of Tiamat's Destruction;The place where the Beritra Army defeated Tiamat's Legion in battle. The last survivors are still roaming around this place.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF5b_SZ_C1
string.body: Id Lake;A mysterious lake located between the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5b_SZ_A4] and the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5b_SZ_C2].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF5b_SZ_C2
string.body: Occupied Territory of the Gold Feather Legion;An area occupied by the Gold Feather Legion's Attack Squad, under the command of Elyos Pepe. The Dragonbound are very active in this area.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF5b_SZ_C3
string.body: Lands contested by the Balaur;An area where the survivors of Tiamat's Legion meet the Beritra Army. Located to the south of the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5b_SZ_C2].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF5b_SZ_D1
string.body: Basin of Bassen;A floating piece of land that formed during an explosion at the time when the Rune Tribe was still around. This area is also where the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5b_SV_6011] located.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF5b_SZ_D2
string.body: Sauro Mountains;A mountain range in the southwestern part of South Katalam. The Dragonbound are very active there.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF5b_SZ_D3
string.body: Goldrinyerk Hill;A hill located between the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5b_SZ_E1] and the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5b_SZ_F4].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF5b_SZ_E1
string.body: Goldrinyerk Autonomous District;A neutral zone in South Katalam under the control of Goldrinyerk Limited.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF5b_SZ_E3
string.body: Pandarung;A neutral village in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5b_SZ_E1]. Also the place where Goldrinyerk Limited is headquartered.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF5b_SZ_F1
string.body: Beritra Defence Line;An area where the 43rd Beritra Army's First Unit is currently embroiled in a bitter struggle. Located in the northern part of the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5b_SZ_F4].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF5b_SZ_F2
string.body: Beritra Defence Line;An area where the 43rd Beritra Army's First Unit is currently embroiled in a bitter struggle. Located in the northern part of the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5b_SZ_F4].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF5b_SZ_F3
string.body: Beritra Defence Line;An area where the 43rd Beritra Army's First Unit is currently embroiled in a bitter struggle. Located in the northern part of the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5b_SZ_F4].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF5b_SZ_F4
string.body: Prades Plains;Plains in the southeastern part of South Katalam, where the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5b_SV_6021] is located.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF5b_SZ_G1
string.body: Forgotten Swamp;A swamp located between the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5b_SZ_E1] and the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5b_SZ_A4].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF5b_SV_6011
string.body: Bassen Fortress;A sky fortress in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5b_SZ_D1]. The 43rd Beritra Army's Third Unit is stationed there.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF5b_SV_6021
string.body: Prades Fortress;A fortress on the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5b_SZ_F4]. The 43rd Beritra Army's First Unit is staying there.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF5a_G1
string.body: Saphirunerk Plantation;A kokonat plantation run by [%dic:STR_DIC_N_LDF5a_Sapparing_E] of the Saphirunerk Company.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF5a_G2
string.body: Portis Swamp;A swamp in the southern part of the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5a_G1]. Name after Portis, High Priest of the Elyos.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF5a_G3
string.body: Saphirunerk Lumber Camp;A Lumber Camp in the southern of the Portis Swamp, where the Temple of Tears was also found. Administered by the Saphirunerk Company.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF5a_F
string.body: Gritt's Experimentation Field;Gritt of the Tiamat Legion used to conducts experiments with Id here. They went bad, which is why the land is now desolate and filled with roaming Undead.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF5a_E1_E2
string.body: Sillus Mountains;The central area of the mountain range where the Sillus Fortress is located.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF5a_E3
string.body: Western Sillus Mountains;The western part of the Sillus Mountains, adjacent to the northern part of the Eremion Ramparts. A cold, rugged mountain range.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF5a_E4
string.body: Workshop in the Ice Valley;An ore mine managed by [%dic:STR_DIC_N_LDF5a_Mairing_E] of the Mairinerk Company.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF5a_E5
string.body: Eremion North Gate;This gate connects North and South Katalam.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF5a_E6
string.body: Ruins of Regret;An abandoned region to the east of the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5a_E5]. Traces of the Rune Tribe, who once inhabited the region, are said to have been preserved there.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF5a_E7
string.body: Krerunerk Mine;An ore mine which [%dic:STR_DIC_N_LDF5a_Krering_E] of the Krerunerk Company manages.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF5a_E8
string.body: Eastern Sillus Mountains;The eastern part of the Sillus Mountains, adjacent to the northern part of the Eremion Ramparts. A cold, rugged mountain range.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF5a_C1
string.body: Rubininerk Farm;A kokonat farm run by [%dic:STR_DIC_N_LDF5a_Rubyring_E] of the Rubininerk Company.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF5a_C2
string.body: Shadow Forest;A forest where the nature of ancient Katalam is preserved. Traces of the ancient Rune Tribe can still be found here.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF5a_C3
string.body: Rubininerk Lumber Camp;A Lumber Camp in the southern part of the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5a_C2]. It is run by the Rubininerk Company.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF5a_D
string.body: Tiamat Battlefield;The site where the Dregion who crashed can be found. It is a dangerous area, as a great number desperate souls, most likely belonging to the unfortunate victims who died in the crash, are roaming around.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF5A_OP_L
string.body: Rebuilt Tower of Light;The most important garrison of the Elyos in North Katalam.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF5A_A4
string.body: Granu Forest;A forest where Granu, a Spirit of Elim, dwells. Located to the west of the rebuilt Tower of Light in North Katalam.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF5A_A3
string.body: Lake of Solitude;A lake between the Hadradim Forest and the Granu Forest. The former site of a Rune Tribe building, now a Reian Garrison.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF5A_B5
string.body: Derelict Village;A village to the east of the Talon Path, where the Dragonbound worshippers of Jormungand have settled. Can also be reached from the Stelman Region.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF5A_B6
string.body: Ruins of Sorrow;Rune Tribe ruins in the center of North Katalam. The estate of a Rune Tribe member by the name of Talonin is believed to have stood here once.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF5A_B7
string.body: Chasm of Silence;A chasm to the east of the Ruins of Sorrow.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF5A_B8
string.body: Fog Spring;A spring located between the Chasm of Silence and the Ruins of Sorrow. It is a gateway point that leads to several regions.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF5A_OP_D
string.body: Rune Temple;A key Asmodian garrison in North Katalam.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF5A_A2
string.body: Hadradim Forest;Hadradim, the Nevilim who was able to prevail through petrification, lives in this forest. Located to the east of the Rune Temple in North Katalam.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF5A_B4
string.body: Talonin Path;Leads to the ruins of the Estate of Talonin, who was a member of the Rune Tribe. The path lies to the south of the Lake of Solitude.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF5A_B1
string.body: Stelman's Territory;An area that Stelman conquered and named after himself.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF5A_B2
string.body: Tainted Lands;The place where the Idgel Cube that the Rune Tribe was hiding exploded. This stretch of land is can be found to the west of the Ruins of Sorrow.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF5a_A1_A6
string.body: Stelman Region;You can reach this area by heading south from the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5A_OP_D].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF5a_A5_A7
string.body: Southern Ancient Forest;The [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5A_OP_L] is located in this forest.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF5a_B2_B3
string.body: Tainted Lands;The place where the Idgel Cube that the Rune Tribe was hiding exploded. This stretch of land is can be found to the west of the Ruins of Sorrow.

string.body: Marching Route of the Gold Feather Legion;A passage named after the Gold Feather Legion which leads to the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5A_B6].

string.body: Dredgion Crash Site;The site where the Dredgion crashed. The cause of the crash is still unclear.

string.body: Nania's Residence;Nania's Residence at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5A_A3]. Nania was the last person to see Kahrun.

string.body: Eracus Guard Post;A guard post in the Eracus desert that can be occupied.

string.body: Kaidan Guard Post;A guard post in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF2_SZ_K] that can be occupied.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF3_Village_01
string.body: Kishar Guard Post;A guard post in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_E1] that can be occupied.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF3_Village_02
string.body: Research Centre Guard Post;A guard post in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_003] that can be occupied.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF5_Under_SensoryArea_Q16920
string.body: Entry to Runadium;Once used by the Rune People to access the arena. Rumour has it that it was destroyed by the [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF5_Under_Rune_FrostNmd_2_N_Ma_65_Ah].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDLDF5_Under_Rune
string.body: Runadium;An old training arena where the Rune People increased their magical powers using Id.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDRuneweapon
string.body: Katalamize;The place where Hyperion, the weapon of the Rune People, rests.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF5a_E1_QUEST
string.body: Silius Fortress Path;A path that leads to the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5a_SV_5011] in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5a_E1_E2]. The peak of a ridge is visible halfway up the path.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF5a_E2_QUEST
string.body: Cold Valley;A valley in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5a_E1_E2]. From here, you can follow the path to the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5a_SV_5011].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF5b_SZ_D1_1
string.body: Bassen Reservoir;A reservoir in the northern part of the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5b_SZ_D1], which formed due to an explosion of Id. A path leading to the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5b_SZ_G1] passes by here.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF5b_SZ_D1_2
string.body: Arid Basin;Located in the southern part of the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5b_SZ_D1]. A cavern connects it to the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5b_SZ_D2].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF5b_SZ_D2_2
string.body: Sauro Hill Path;Lies in the southern part of the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5b_SZ_D2] and leads to the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5b_SZ_D2_1].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF5b_SZ_D2_3
string.body: Silent Highlands;An area in the northern part of the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5b_SZ_D2], through which it is possible to reach the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5b_SZ_B3].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF5b_SZ_F4_2
string.body: Plains Supply Path;Located in the northern part of the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5b_SZ_F4]. Follow the path to get to the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5b_SZ_F3] and the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5b_SZ_F4_1].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF5b_SZ_F4_3
string.body: Plains of Discord;An area in the southern part of the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5b_SZ_F4]. A path leading to the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5b_SZ_D3] is in this area.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDASTERIA_IU_WORLD_01
string.body: Rukibuki Circus;Circus run by [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDASTERIA_NMD_03]. Currently in the red.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_Tiamat_Down
string.body: Tiamaranta's Eye;A massive fortress at the centre of Tiamaranta. Tiamat's Fortress floats above it.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_ZONE_NAME_IDLDF5_Under_03
string.body: Rune Shield Tower;A tower built by the Rune to protect the Id field. It can be reached via the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDF5_U3_FOBJ_Entrance] in Akaron.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_ZONE_NAME_IDLDF5_Under_03_SZ_S1
string.body: Shield Chamber;It is on the uppermost level of the Rune Shield Tower. This is where the shields are activated as soon as the four generators in the tower are fully charged.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDLDF5b_TD_War
string.body: Steel Wall Bastion Battlefield;This fortress is an important gateway. It has been occupied by the Beritra Army under the command of [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDF5_TD_War_Vri_Boss_65_Al].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDAbRe_Up3_Crotan_02
string.body: Hidden Krotan War Fortress;A secret Balaur camp which can be used to reach the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_33]. You can only gain entry with the help of the officer responsible. He appears in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_33] as soon as it is conquered.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDAbRe_Up3_Dkisas_02
string.body: Hidden Kysis War Fortress;A secret Balaur camp which can be used to reach the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_37]. You can only gain entry with the help of the officer responsible. He appears in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_37] as soon as it is conquered.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDAbRe_Up3_Lamiren_02
string.body: Hidden Miren War Fortress;A secret Balaur camp which can be used to reach the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_30]. You can only gain entry with the help of the officer responsible. He appears in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_30] as soon as it is conquered.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_DF4_SensoryArea_Q24062a
string.body: Corridor Observation Post;A post from which the entrance to the Silentera Canyon in Gelkmaros is watched.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4b_SensoryArea_Q14081
string.body: Centre of the Heart of Petrification;The centre of the Heart of Petrification, one of Balaur Lord Tiamat's sources of power in Tiamaranta.

string.name: STR_DIC_LF4_SensoryArea_Q14062
string.body: Corridor Guard Post;A Balaur guard post at the entrance to the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_ZONE_NAME_Underpass].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDKamar
string.body: Kamar Battlefield;A battlefield for 12 against 12. After Kahrun vanished, the Balaur assault turned Kamar into a bloody theatre of war.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDArena_Glory
string.body: Arena of Glory;A new arena in the Crucible Coliseum. The four finest fighters from the Arena of Vehemence and the Arena of Cooperation can compete here.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDLDF5_Under_01_War
string.body: Jormungand Marching Route;A battlefield for 6 against 6. The marching route is passed on the way to Beritra's Estate. Elyos and Asmodians are fighting bitterly for a favourable starting point.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_DF1_ItemUseArea_Q24031
string.body: Perimeter of the Ishalgen Abyss Gate;An Abyss Gate lies hidden in [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA193]. [%dic:STR_DIC_I_quest_24031a] can be used here.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_DF1A_ItemUseArea_Q24031
string.body: Perimeter of the Altgard Abyss Gate;An Abyss Gate lies hidden in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF1A_31]. [%dic:STR_DIC_I_quest_24031b] can be used here.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_DF2_ItemUseArea_Q24031
string.body: Perimeter of the Morheim Abyss Gate;An Abyss Gate lies hidden in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF2_SUB_E4_3]. [%dic:STR_DIC_I_quest_24031c] can be used here.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDAbRe_Up3_Dkisas_02_N
string.body: Kysis War Fortress;A hidden Balaur fortress that can be reached through the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_37]. It is currently in the hands of the Ereshkigal Legion. You can only set foot inside once your allies have conquered the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_37].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDAbRe_Up3_Lamiren_02_N
string.body: Miren War Fortress;A hidden Balaur fortress that can be entered through the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_30]. It is currently in the hands of the Ereshkigal Legion. You can only set foot inside once your allies have conquered the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_30].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDAbRe_Up3_Crotan_02_N
string.body: Krotan War Fortress;A hidden Balaur fortress that can be reached through the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_33]. It is currently in the hands of the Ereshkigal Legion. You can only set foot inside once your allies have captured the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_33].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4_Advance_B_v01
string.body: 93rd Garrison;A defence post at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4_Advance_SZ_B_01]that can be occupied.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4_Advance_C_v02
string.body: 94th Garrison;A defence post in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4_Advance_SZ_C_01] that can be occupied.

string.body: 95th Garrison;A defence post in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4_Advance_SZ_D_01] that can be occupied.

string.body: 96th Garrison;A defence post on the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4_Advance_SZ_E_01]that can be occupied.

string.body: 97th Garrison;A defence post in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4_Advance_SZ_G_01] that can be occupied.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4_Advance_H_v06
string.body: 98th Garrison;A defence post in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4_Advance_SZ_H_01] that can be occupied.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4_Advance_I_v07
string.body: 99th Garrison;A defence post in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4_Advance_SZ_I_01] that can be occupied.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4_Advance_J_v08
string.body: 100th Garrison;A defence post in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4_Advance_SZ_J_01] that can be occupied.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4_Advance_SZ_Base_Dr_01
string.body: 90th Invasion Base;A medium-size defence post in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4_Advance_SZ_K_01] that can be occupied.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4_Advance_SZ_Base_Dr_02
string.body: 91st Invasion Base;A medium-size defence post in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4_Advance_SZ_B_01] that can be occupied.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4_Advance_SZ_Base_Dr_03
string.body: 92nd Invasion Base;A medium-size defence post in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4_Advance_SZ_G_01] that can be occupied.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4_Advance_SZ_A_01
string.body: Fissure Barrier Field;One of the places where Tiamat erected barriers to seal off Akaron. The [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4_Advance_SZ_OP_L] is located here.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4_Advance_SZ_B_01
string.body: Ancient Supply Route;A supply route in the north of Akaron. It was probably built by Tiamat's army.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4_Advance_SZ_C_01
string.body: Akaron Beach Cave;A cave at the eastern end of Akaron Beach.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4_Advance_SZ_D_01
string.body: Chapir Settlement;An area of Akaron inhabited by the Chapir.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4_Advance_SZ_E_01
string.body: Marching Route of the Expedition Troop;This route connects the Elger Expedition Camp with the Tiamat Basin.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4_Advance_SZ_F_01
string.body: Akaron Spring;A watery area in which [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4_Advance_SZ_OP_D] can be found.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4_Advance_SZ_G_01
string.body: Invasion Valley;A valley in Southern Akaron which is home to Beritra attack bases.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4_Advance_SZ_H_01
string.body: Forest of Silence;A quiet spot in Western Akaron which is much more beautiful than the other forests in Balaurea.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4_Advance_SZ_I_01
string.body: Popoku Settlement;A Popoku settlement near the Forest of Silence. Rumour has it that they revere the Balaur.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4_Advance_SZ_J_01
string.body: Valpurah Plateau;A plateau to the east of the Tiamat Basin which connects lots of different regions.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4_Advance_SZ_K_01
string.body: Tiamat Basin;A basin in the centre of Akaron in which the Balaur base and Tiamat ruins can be found.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4_Advance_SZ_OP_L
string.body: Elger Expedition Camp;The Deathsong Legion's Expedition Camp is stationed here.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4_Advance_SZ_OP_D
string.body: Helgund Patrol Outpost;A base where the Darkseekers led by the Helgund Tribunus are stationed.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF5_Fortress
string.body: Kaldor;A region in Katalam where the most important Rune fortress once stood. The area has been left scarred by a violent explosion.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF5_Fortress_SZ_A1_v01
string.body: Northern Outpost;A post in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5_Fortress_SZ_A1] that can be occupied.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF5_Fortress_SZ_A2_v02
string.body: Southern Outpost;A post in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5_Fortress_SZ_A2] that can be occupied.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF5_Fortress_SZ_A1
string.body: Northern Splinter Forest;A forest in the north of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5_Fortress]. It was almost entirely unaffected by the explosion.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF5_Fortress_SZ_A1_Start
string.body: Rubininerk Settlement;This area is located in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5_Fortress_SZ_A1] in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5_Fortress], and was claimed by Rubininerk society.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF5_Fortress_SZ_A2
string.body: Southern Splinter Forest;A forest in the south of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5_Fortress]. It was almost entirely unaffected by the explosion.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF5_Fortress_SZ_A2_Start
string.body: Saphirunerk Settlement;This area is located in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5_Fortress_SZ_A2] in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5_Fortress], and was claimed by Saphirunerk society.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF5_Fortress_SZ_A3
string.body: Crossroads of Battle;Crossroads between the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5_Fortress_SZ_A1] and the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5_Fortress_SZ_A2], which lead to the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5_Fortress_SZ_B1].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF5_Fortress_SZ_A3_Named
string.body: Cave of Silence;A cave on the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5_Fortress_SZ_A3]. Tiamat's remaining soldiers are stationed here.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF5_Fortress_SZ_A3_V01_Garage
string.body: Garage of the Northern Outpost;The tanks of the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5_Fortress_SZ_A1_v01] are parked in this garage. It is located on the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5_Fortress_SZ_A3].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF5_Fortress_SZ_A3_V02_Garage
string.body: Garage of the Southern Outpost;The tanks of the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5_Fortress_SZ_A2_v02] are parked in this garage. It is located on the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5_Fortress_SZ_A3].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF5_Fortress_SZ_A4
string.body: Way of the Holy Tree;A steep forest track which leads to [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5_Fortress_SZ_A1]. It passes a holy tree.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF5_Fortress_SZ_A5
string.body: Cleared Glade;An area which borders the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5_Fortress_SZ_A2]. The area is littered with trees which were probably uprooted in the explosion.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF5_Fortress_SZ_B1
string.body: Heroic Ruins;Ruins of the Rune Tribe which can be accessed via the[%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5_Fortress_SZ_D1]. It is said that an artefact is hidden here.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF5_Fortress_SZ_B2
string.body: Barricade;A wall which borders onto the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5_Fortress_SZ_A4].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF5_Fortress_SZ_B3
string.body: Kaldor Ruins;Ruins which border onto the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5_Fortress_SZ_A5]. A statue belonging to the once thriving Rune Tribe still stands here.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF5_Fortress_SZ_C1
string.body: Flaming Eye;An area which can be reached via the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5_Fortress_7011], in which an artefact is hidden. The explosion caused major damage here.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF5_Fortress_SZ_C2
string.body: Crater of Flames;An area which leads to the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5_Fortress_SZ_B3]. Traces of the explosion are clearly visible.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF5_Fortress_SZ_D1
string.body: Anoha Ruins;The [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5_Fortress_7011] is located in the ruins.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF5_Fortress_SZ_D2
string.body: Burnt Plain;An area which can be used to access [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5_Fortress_7011], where an artefact is hidden.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF5_Fortress_7011
string.body: Anoha Fortress;A fortress on the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5_Fortress_SZ_D1]. Before the explosion, it was crucially important to the Rune and was run by Commander Anoha.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF5_Fortress_SensoryArea_Q10100
string.body: Northern Invasion Zone;An area on the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5_Fortress_SZ_A5] in Kaldor. There appear to be a large number of Id deposits here.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF5_Fortress_SensoryArea_Q20100
string.body: Southern Invasion Zone;An area on the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5_Fortress_SZ_A4] in Kaldor. There appear to be a large number of Id deposits here.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDLDF4Re_01_Q_SensoryArea_Q10101
string.body: Secret zone of the Research Laboratory;A hidden zone in the Baruna Research Laboratory where the Beritra Army is planning its invasion. The [%dic:STR_DIC_OBJ_IDLDF4Re_01_Q_FOBJ_Q10101b] has been opened.
