string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF5_Fortress_SZ_D1_Raid
string.body: Destroyed Anoha Guardian's Seal;A Rune ruin in which the [%dic:STR_DIC_N_LDF5_Fortress_Named_Spawn_FOBJ] can be found.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4_Advance
string.body: Akaron;Tiamat's headquarters where she regained her strength before ascending to Balaur Lord. The Beritra Army is planning an invasion here.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_Arena_clobby
string.body: Refuge of Returnees;A place in the Empyrean Crucible that was built to support Daevas after their return. Then, it can be entered through the [%dic:STR_DIC_OBJ_Arena_L_clobby_Entrance_In] in Sanctum or with a corresponding returning stone.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_Arena_clobby_D
string.body: Refuge of Returnees;A place in the Empyrean Crucible that was built to support Daevas after their return. It can be entered through the [%dic:STR_DIC_OBJ_Arena_D_clobby_Entrance_In] in Pandaemonium or with a corresponding returning stone.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_DF5_SensoryArea_Q20501a
string.body: Relic Site;The place where the Relic Fragments were found.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_DF5_SensoryArea_Q20503a
string.body: Aetheric Field Stone Site;The place where a new Aetheric Field Stone was found.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_DF5_SensoryArea_Q20506a
string.body: Mysterious Ruins;The place where the lost member of the Search Party carried out his last task.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_DF5_SensoryArea_Q20507a
string.body: Gloomy Cave;The energy here is similar to that found in the Crystal Cave.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF4_Underpass_door
string.body: Inggison Entrance to Silentera;Entrance to Silentera Canyon which is located in the Angrief Ruins of Inggison.

string.name: STR_DIC_IDSweep
string.body: Trillonerk's Secret Gold Vault;A Gold Vault full of gold and silver coins, belonging to Shugo Emperor Trillonerk. Kobolds, Shulacks and Balaur are trying to break in. It can be accessed through [%dic:STR_DIC_NPC_IDSweep_IN_NPC01].

string.name: STR_DIC_IDSweep_Room01
string.body: Burglary Site;This is where the burglars broke into the [%dic:STR_DIC_IDSweep] and left behind traces. It is guarded by Jabaraki.

string.name: STR_DIC_IDSweep_Room02
string.body: Entrance to Trillonerk's Gold Vault;The entrance to Shugo Emperor Trillonerk's Gold Vault. It is guarded by Haruki.

string.name: STR_DIC_IDSweep_Room03
string.body: Trillonerk's Gold Vault;Shugo Emperor's Gold Vault, filled with gold and silver coins.

string.name: STR_DIC_IDSweep_Room04
string.body: Centre of the Gold Vault;The centre of the Gold Vault, in which the treasures of the Shugos are hidden.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF5
string.body: Signia;This area rose from the sea when the continents of Atreia were destroyed after the Great Invasion. The New Start Legion was sent there to investigate what had happened.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF5_SZ_A_01
string.body: Blue Mist Swamp;This area is home to the headquarters of the New Start Legion, which was sent to [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF5].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF5_SZ_B_01
string.body: Southern Coral Hills;An area in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF5].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF5_SZ_C_01
string.body: Northern Coral Hills;An area in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF5]. This is where the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF5_SZ_Village_01] is located.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF5_SZ_D_01
string.body: Balaur Garden;The Garden of the Dragon Lords located in the north of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF5]. The [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF5_SZ_OP_02] can be found here.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF5_SZ_E_01
string.body: Balaur Central Garden;The Central Garden of the Dragon Lord located in the centre of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF5].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF5_SZ_F_01
string.body: Temple of the Sunset;A temple in the centre of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF5]. It was built to honour the might of the Dragon Lord. All that is left now is a ruin.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF5_SZ_H_01
string.body: Mossy Forest;This area is located in the south-west of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF5] and is covered in moss.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF5_SZ_I_01
string.body: Mist-Thorn Forest;A dark forest in the south-west of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF5]. The densely packed trees ensure that it remains pitch black here even during the day.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF5_SZ_J_01
string.body: Thorny Desert;A desert area in the north-east of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF5].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF5_SZ_K_01
string.body: Magma Canyon;Canyon in the north-east of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF5]. The Makarna Entrance can be found there.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF5_SZ_P1_01
string.body: Black Fins Canyon;A deep, dangerous canyon in the north-west of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF5]. The Black Fins have settled in villages there.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF5_SZ_P2_01
string.body: Crystal Cave;A cave in the centre of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF5]. An icy wind that can freeze living beings where they stand blows through it.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF5_SZ_OP_01
string.body: New Start Legion Headquarters;Located in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF5_SZ_A_01] in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF5].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF5_SZ_OP_02
string.body: New Start Legion Attack Post;Located in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF5_SZ_D_01] in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF5].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF5_SZ_OP_03
string.body: New Start Legion Outpost;New Start Legion Base located in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF5_SZ_H_01] in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF5].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF5_SZ_Village_01
string.body: Kaion Camp;Can be found in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF5_SZ_C_01]. The archaeologist Kaion is researching the life and culture of Signia there.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF5_SZ_Village_02
string.body: Ruins of the Dragon Lord;They are located in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF5_SZ_E_01]. Although Tiamat was destroyed, the battle against Beritra's troops still rages in these ruins.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF5_SZ_Village_03
string.body: Supply Storeroom;It is located in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF5_SZ_F_01]. It can be used for secure storage as it is well protected by high rock faces.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF5_SZ_Village_04
string.body: New Start Legion Guard Post;Located in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF5_SZ_J_01] in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF5].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF5_SZ_ID_01
string.body: Aturam Guard Post;This guard post was constructed when the route to Aturam Sky Fortress was discovered.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF5_SZ_ID_02
string.body: Reian Refugee Camp;This camp was constructed when the Reians came to Signia and discovered the entrance to the Rentus Base.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF5_SZ_ID_03
string.body: Fortress Ruins;Ruins of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDTiamat_SZ_R1] and [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDTiamat_SZ_T1].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF5_SZ_ID_04
string.body: Mantor Entrance;An entrance to Mantor.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF5_SZ_ID_05
string.body: Entrance to Jormungand's Bridge;This entrance leads to Jormungand's Bridge.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF5_SZ_ID_06
string.body: Entrance to the Rune Tribe Refuge;An entrance to the Rune Tribe Refuge.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_DF5
string.body: Vengar;An area that rose up after the continents were destroyed during the Great Invasion.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF5_SZ_C_Shark
string.body: Black Fins Village;The village of the Black Fins, which is located at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF5_SZ_C_01].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF6_SZ_C_Shark_Fresco
string.body: Wall Relief;A wall relief that can be found in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF5_SZ_C_Shark].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_DF5_SZ_A_01
string.body: Colourful Coast;The first area discovered by the Expedition Troop. The exploration of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF5] begins here.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_DF5_SZ_B_01
string.body: Sea Ruins;An area that is dominated by ruins.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_DF5_SZ_C_01
string.body: Skolait Hill;A hill featuring giant Skolait Ancient Fossils.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_DF5_SZ_D_01
string.body: Twilight Forest;A beautiful forest where a golden sunset can be seen.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_DF5_SZ_E_01
string.body: Moonbeam Valley;Moon Coral is plentiful in this valley.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_DF5_SZ_F_01
string.body: Ancient Fossil Canyon;A canyon in which giant fossils were discovered.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_DF5_SZ_G_01
string.body: Dragon Canyon;The Balaur Altar is located in this canyon.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_DF5_SZ_H_01
string.body: Northern Red Desert;The north of the Red Desert, where the ground is covered in red Coral.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_DF5_SZ_H_02
string.body: Southern Red Desert;The south of the Red Desert, where the ground is covered in red Coral.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_DF5_SZ_I_01
string.body: Jotun Ruins;An area in which the remains of the ancient Jotun can be found.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_DF5_SZ_J_01
string.body: Dragon Cemetery;Wasteland where countless Balaur remains are buried.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_DF5_SZ_K_01
string.body: Echo Rock;A place where Ereshkigal's Voice can be heard.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_DF5_SZ_P1_01
string.body: Aquan Valley;A valley populated by the Aquans.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_DF5_SZ_P2_01
string.body: Deep Sea;A very deep sea. It radiates a baleful energy.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_DF5_SZ_OP_01
string.body: Temple of Oblivion;A temple that a Dragon Lord built for himself a long time ago. The first Expedition Troop to arrive in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF5] constructed its base there.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_DF5_SZ_OP_02
string.body: Temple of Sunset;A temple in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF5_SZ_D_01]. The Expedition Troop constructed its base here.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_DF5_SZ_OP_03
string.body: Oasis Temple;A temple in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF5_SZ_H_02]. The Protectorate constructed its base there.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_DF5_SZ_Village_01
string.body: Valkyr Camp;The camp that is home to the Valkyr. It is managed by Vice Captain Valkyr himself.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_DF5_SZ_Village_02
string.body: Relics of the Dragon Lord;Although Tiamat was destroyed, the battle against Beritra's troops still rages in these ruins.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_DF5_SZ_Village_03
string.body: Supply Camp;The most convenient strategic location for storing supplies safely. Managed by Vice Captain Knut.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_DF5_SZ_Village_04
string.body: Fatebound Base;The Fatebound's attack base at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF5_SZ_J_01]. It is run by [%dic:STR_DIC_N_DF5_Vard_E].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_DF5_SZ_E_02
string.body: Moonbeam Cave;A giant cave lit by moonlight.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_DF5_SZ_ID_01
string.body: Sky Fortress Attack Base;The place where the Invasion Corridor to [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDStation_SZ_Station] was discovered.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_DF5_SZ_ID_02
string.body: Rentus Base;The place where the Invasion Corridor to [%dic:STR_DIC_W_ZONE_NAME_IDYun] was discovered. The Reians constructed a base here in order to recapture the Rentus Base.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_DF5_SZ_ID_03
string.body: Eye of Destruction;The place which connects the ruins of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDTiamat_SZ_R1] and [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDTiamat_SZ_T1].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_DF5_SZ_ID_04
string.body: Mantor Base;The place where the Invasion Corridor to Mantor was discovered.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_DF5_SZ_ID_05
string.body: Pursuit Route;The place where the Invasion Corridor was discovered. It leads to Jormungand's Bridge.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_DF5_SZ_ID_06
string.body: Refuge Research Area;The place where the Invasion Corridor to the Rune Tribe Refuge was discovered.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_DF5_SZ_Event_01
string.body: Mysterious Cave;A cave containing a baleful energy.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_DF5_SZ_Event_02
string.body: Aetheric Field Stone Site;The place where an active Aetheric Field Stone belonging to Tiamat was found.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_DF5_SZ_Event_03
string.body: Balaur Altar;The place where the Beritra Army attempted to use powerful forces.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_DF5_SZ_Event_04
string.body: Mysterious Ruins;The place where a member of the Search Party carried out his last task.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_DF5_SZ_Raid_01
string.body: Infernal Cave;A cave containing terrible flame beasts.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_DF5_SZ_Raid_02
string.body: Balaur Refuge;A cave in which one of Tiamat's Commanders is said to have sought refuge.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_DF5_SZ_Defence_01
string.body: Colourful Coast Defence Line;An area for defending the Colourful Coast.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_DF5_SZ_Defence_02
string.body: Sea Ruins Defence Line;An area for defending the Sea Ruins.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_DF5_SZ_Defence_03
string.body: Northern Defence Line for the Twilight Forest;An area for defending the Twilight Forest.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_DF5_SZ_Defence_04
string.body: Defence Line for Dragon Canyon;An area for defending Dragon Canyon.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_DF5_SZ_Defence_05
string.body: Southern Defence Line for the Red Desert;An area for defending the Red Desert.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_DF5_SZ_Defence_06
string.body: Eastern Defence Line for the Twilight Forest;An area for defending the Twilight Forest.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_DF5_SZ_Defence_07
string.body: Western Defence Line for the Red Desert;An area for defending the Red Desert.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_DF5_SZ_Defence_08
string.body: Northern Defence Line for the Red Desert;One of the defensive sites in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF5]. It lies between the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF5_SZ_I_01] and the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF5_SZ_H_01].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_DF5_SensoryArea_Q25084
string.body: Eerie Place;A place that appears to bring only ill.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_DF4_Underpass_door
string.body: Gelkmaros Entrance to Silentera;An entrance to Silentera Canyon located in the Vorgaltem Battlefield in Gelkmaros.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDTiamat_2_F5_FOBJ_Entrance
string.body: Tiamat's Hideout;Dragon Lord Tiamat's Hideout in the enemy camp. The Elyos can access it using the [%dic:STR_DIC_OBJ_IDTiamat_2_F5_FOBJ_Entrance], and the Asmodians using the [%dic:STR_DIC_OBJ_IDTiamat_2_F5_FOBJ_Entrance_Dark].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_ZONE_NAME_IDYun_Hard
string.body: Lost Rentus Base;A secret Reian training camp which became their last hope following the destruction of Sarpan. The Elyos can access it in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF5_SZ_ID_02], the Asmodians via [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF5_SZ_ID_02].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDSeal
string.body: Makarna;Translated from the Balaur language, the name means "forbidden holy place". Fregion sealed the Dragon Lord Ereshkigal here. You can reach this place through the [%dic:STR_DIC_OBJ_IDSeal_Entrance_v60].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_DF5_SZ_Event_08
string.body: Defence line of the 48th Army;Beritra Army base which defends the route from [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF5_SZ_E_01] to [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF5_SZ_F_01].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_DF5_SZ_Event_07
string.body: Base of the Cursed;The base manned by the [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_DF5_F_MissionTiamat_Fi_61_An] in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF5_SZ_E_01].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF5_SZ_P1_Base_03
string.body: 3rd Defence Post;One of the New Start Legion's defence posts in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF5]. It lies between the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF5_SZ_P1_01] and the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF5_SZ_D_01].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF5_SZ_P2_Base_06
string.body: 6th Defence Post;One of the New Start Legion's defence posts in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF5]. It lies between the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF5_SZ_P2_01] and the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF5_SZ_H_01].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF5_SZ_I_Base_07
string.body: 7th Defence Post;One of the New Start Legion's defence posts in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF5]. It lies between the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF5_SZ_I_01] and the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF5_SZ_H_01].

string.body: Stormy Isles;Eight islands in the centre of the Depths of the Abyss They include the Wave Island, the Wind Island, the Frost Island, the Cloud Island, the Hurricane Island, the Gale Island, the Typhoon Island and the Zephyr Island.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF4
string.body: Inggison;A region in southern Balaurea. Lord Kaisinel used the power of illusion to erect a mighty fortress here in order to halt the Balaur advance.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_DF4
string.body: Gelkmaros;A territory in Balaurea. Lord Marchutan has invaded it in order to stop Tiamat. It connects to Inggison via the Silentera Canyon.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LC1
string.body: Sanctum;The most important city in Elysea, where Lyceum, Elyos Square and the Protector's Hall can be found. It was established after the Cataclysm to lend new strength to the despairing Elyos and to unite them.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF6
string.body: Esterra;A region in Elysea near the Tower of Eternity. It was once the site of Ariel's Refuge. The Aetheric Field makes time pass more slowly there. That's why creatures from the era of the Cataclysm can still be found there.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF6_OP
string.body: Ariel's Refuge;An Elyos base in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF6].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF6_OP_Square
string.body: Sanctuary Square;A square in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF6_OP] where you will find a fragment of the Tower of Eternity.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF6_OP_Mainroom
string.body: Hall of Light;Elyos command centre on [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF6_OP_Square].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_DF6
string.body: Nosra;A region in Asmodae near the Tower of Eternity. It was once the site of Azphel's Temple. The Aetheric Field makes time pass more slowly there. That's why creatures from the era of the Cataclysm can still be found there.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_DF6_OP
string.body: Azphel's Temple;An Asmodian base in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF6].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_DF6_OP_Square
string.body: Temple Square;The square in front of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF6_OP]. There, you will find an enormous fragment of the Tower of Eternity.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_DF6_OP_Mainroom
string.body: Centre of Darkness;Asmodian command centre on the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF6_OP_Square].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF6_SZ_A1
string.body: Immortal Light Refuge;A region in the centre of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF6]. Ariel's Refuge was once in this holy place, before the Cataclysm.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF6_SZ_A2
string.body: Twilight Garden;A region in the centre of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF6]. This was once the garden of Ariel, the Lord of Light.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF6_SZ_B1
string.body: Gorge of Fallacy;A region in the south-east of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF6].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF6_SZ_B2
string.body: Coast of the Doomed;A region in the south-east of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF6]. It can be found at the end of the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF6_SZ_B1].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF6_SZ_C
string.body: Colourful Swamp;A region in the south-east of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF6]. Many scientifically important plants grow here.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF6_SZ_D
string.body: Wind Valley;A region in the south-west of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF6]. Sapiens live here.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF6_SZ_E
string.body: Forest of Silence;A region in the west of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF6]. Before the Cataclysm, there was an altar here where Ariel was worshipped.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF6_SZ_F1
string.body: Forest of Life;A forest in the north-west of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF6]. Since it contains many fragments of the Tower of Eternity, the forest is full of Life Energy.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF6_SZ_F2
string.body: Aether Temple;An old ruin in the north-west of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF6]. According to legend, Aether glows there at night. It has special powers.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF6_SZ_G
string.body: Storm Plateau;A region in the north of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF6]. Sometimes the power of the Aether grows so strong that you can fly there.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF6_SZ_H1
string.body: Krall Aether Mine;A region in the north-east of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF6]. The Krall harvest Aether from this mine.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF6_SZ_H2
string.body: Tarha Village;A region in the north-east of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF6]. The Tarha Krall live here.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF6_SZ_I
string.body: Mushroom Gorge;A region in the east of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF6]. The excess Aether here created an incredibly diverse plant life.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF6_SZ_A1_BF1
string.body: Rotia Research Area;A place where a large fragment of the Tower of Eternity was found. The Heavenly Lights were sent here to investigate it.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF6_SZ_A1_BF2
string.body: Nero Research Area;A place where a large fragment of the Tower of Eternity was found. The Heavenly Lights were sent here to investigate it.

string.body: Elyos Defence Fleet;An Elyos defensive fleet

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF6_SZ_L_Ship
string.body: Shadowbringer Battle Fleet;An Asmodian fleet armed for battle. As soon as it reaches Esterra, a wind begins to blow, guided by [%dic:STR_DIC_N_LF6_OP_Event_B_In].

string.body: Sky Island of the Gorge of Fallacy;A floating island in the sky over the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF6_SZ_B1]. It can only be reached using the [%dic:STR_DIC_N_LF6_B1_Event_N_In].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_DF6_SZ_A1
string.body: Red Dawn Plains;A holy place in the centre of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF6], where Azphel's Temple once stood before the Cataclysm.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_DF6_SZ_A2
string.body: Swamp of Silence;A holy place in the centre of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF6], where Azphel's Temple once stood before the Cataclysm.

string.body: Feather Branch Forest;A region in the centre of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF6].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_DF6_SZ_B2
string.body: Sphiro's Territory;A region southwest of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF6]. It can be found in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF6_SZ_B1].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_DF6_SZ_C
string.body: Cursed Gorge;A region southeast of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF6]. According to legend, monsters appear there during the day and feed on the plants' essences.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_DF6_SZ_D
string.body: Calyda Canyon;A region southeast of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF6]. Sapiens live here.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_DF6_SZ_E
string.body: Plateau of Retribution;A region to the east of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF6]. Sometimes the power of the Aether grows so strong that you can fly there.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_DF6_SZ_F1
string.body: Forest of Illusions;A region northeast of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF6]. The plants grow on enormous Aether Fragments, so that the forest is full of Life Energy.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_DF6_SZ_F2
string.body: Ruins of History;A region in the north-east of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF6]. Apparently, when night falls, you can see the past there.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_DF6_SZ_G
string.body: Sea of Life;A region in the north of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF6] where holy trees grow. Not everyone is allowed to go there.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_DF6_SZ_H1
string.body: Black Mane Mountains;A region in the north-west of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF6]. The ancient Mau live here.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_DF6_SZ_H2
string.body: Zenzen Territory;A region in the north-west of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF6]. The ancient Skurv live here.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_DF6_SZ_I
string.body: Saphora Forest;A region in the west of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF6]. According to legend, stunning red flowers bloom here during the night.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_DF6_SZ_F1_Qspot
string.body: Lookout Post of the Forest of Illusions;An Asmodian lookout post in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF6_SZ_F1].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_DF6_SZ_F2_Qspot
string.body: Lookout Post of the Ruins of History;An Asmodian lookout post in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF6_SZ_F2].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_DF6_SZ_G_Qspot
string.body: Lookout Post of the Sea of Life;An Asmodian lookout post by the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF6_SZ_G].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_DF6_SZ_H1_Qspot
string.body: Lookout Post of the Black Mane Mountains;An Asmodian lookout post in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF6_SZ_H1].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_DF6_SZ_I_Qspot
string.body: Lookout Post of the Saphora Forest;An Asmodian lookout post in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF6_SZ_I].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_DF6_SensoryArea_Q25606a
string.body: Apparition Site;A mysterious site in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF6_SZ_G].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF6_SZ_G_Wing_02
string.body: Training Ground of the Storm Plateau;A small floating island over the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF6_SZ_G].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF6_SZ_G_Wing
string.body: Island of Freedom;A large floating island over the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF6_SZ_G].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF6_SZ_OP_square
string.body: Sanctuary Square;A square in the centre of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF6_SZ_OP].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_STR_LF6_SZ_F2_square
string.body: Place of Creation;A site in the centre of the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF6_SZ_F2].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF6_SZ_I_Cave
string.body: Black Mushroom Valley;A valley in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF6_SZ_I] in which black mushrooms grow. The smell is unbearable.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_DF6_SensoryArea_Q15613a
string.body: Meeting Point;You can meet [%dic:STR_DIC_N_DF6_Schedar_E] at this site on the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF6_SZ_E].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_DF6_SZ_E_FloatingSquare
string.body: Altar of Stillness;A mysterious building in the sky over [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF6_SZ_E_Square].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_DF6_SZ_E_Square
string.body: Gargos;A mysterious place on the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF6_SZ_E].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_DF5_SZ_F2_Garden
string.body: Garden of Time;An old garden in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF6_SZ_F2].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_DF6_SZ_B2_Sanctum
string.body: Feather Refuge;Sphiro's refuge in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF6_SZ_B2].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_DF6_SZ_B2_Named
string.body: Sphiro's Nest;A nest in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF6_SZ_B2]. Sometimes [%dic:STR_DIC_M_DF6_B2_24_Named_Birdmom_70_Al] appears there.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_DF6_SZ_C_Deepwood
string.body: Grim Forest;A region in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF6_SZ_C]. The essence of the forest can still be found here.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_DF6_SZ_G_Lake
string.body: Spirit Tree;An enormous tree by the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF6_SZ_G].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_DF6_SZ_I_Queen
string.body: Kukur Territory;A region in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF6_SZ_I] where enormous Saphora flowers bloom.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF6_SZ_B2_Ship
string.body: Mysterious Shipwreck Discovery Site;A place in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF6_SZ_B2] where a crumbling shipwreck can be found.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF6_SZ_C_Cellatu
string.body: Cellatu Territory;The territory of the Cellatus in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF6_SZ_C]. They appear as soon as it rains.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF6_SZ_E_Cave
string.body: Black Cavern;A dark cavern in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF6_SZ_E].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_DF6_SZ_F2_Square
string.body: Heroes' Square;A place in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF6_SZ_F2] where the ancient heroes of the Daevas once lived.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_DF3_VakarmaArmy_Hill
string.body: Bakarma Hill;A Balaur area you can find in the deep north beyond [%dic:STR_DIC_W_STR_DF3_SZ_G5].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDDreadgion_04
string.body: Ashunatal Dredgion;A Dredgion commanded by Brigade General Ashunatal. It contains Tiamat's last remaining forces.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDLDF5_Fortress_War
string.body: Runatorium Ruins;The old Rune area that was discovered in Kaldor. It is said that there are great treasures in this place.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDLDF5_Under_02_War
string.body: Balaur Marching Route;A place which, together with the remnants of the destroyed artillery, was cloaked using Shugo technology and where important Beritra Army research objects were found.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDLDF5_Fortress_War_SZ_sqaure
string.body: Arena of Ruins;A circular arena in the centre of the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDLDF5_Fortress_War].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF_Tower_Dejabobo_Room
string.body: Hall of the Wise;A room in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF_Tower] where Dezabo, the wise man of the tower, relaxes. It can only be reached using the [%dic:STR_DIC_OBJ_LF_Tower_FOBJ_Sage_Room_Q_Entrance].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF6_SensoryArea_Q10527a
string.body: Magic Trail;Traces of Agent Weda's magic powder. You found the trail in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF6_SZ_F1]. Dezabo, the wise man of the tower, must have stayed there.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF6_SensoryArea_Q10527b
string.body: Weak Magic Trail;Traces of Agent Weda's magic powder. You found the trail in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF6_SZ_H2]. Dezabo, the wise man of the tower, must have stayed there.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF6_SensoryArea_Q10527c
string.body: Clear Magic Trail;Traces of Agent Weda's magic powder. You found the trail in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF6_SZ_B1]. Dezabo, the wise man of the tower, must have stayed there.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF6_SensoryArea_Q10528a
string.body: Pirate Cave;This is where [%dic:STR_DIC_OBJ_LF6_FOBJ_Bling_Treasure_Q10528a] is hidden. It can be found on the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF6_SZ_B2] in Esterra.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF6_SensoryArea_Q10528b
string.body: Hidden Sky Island;A sky island on which a protection artefact is secretly being crafted. It can only be reached using the [%dic:STR_DIC_OBJ_LF6_FOBJ_Transport_Device_Q10528a].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDF6_Q
string.body: Underground Aether Mine;An Aether mine in the direct vicinity of the Tower of Eternity. A protection artefact is secretly being crafted here.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_DF_Tower_Wizabobo_Room
string.body: Room of the Wise;The room in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF_Tower] where Wizabo, the wise man of the tower, relaxes. You can get there via the corridor near [%dic:STR_DIC_N_DF6_Varotta_E].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_DF6_SensoryArea_Q20527a
string.body: Spell Trail;Traces of Agent Peregran's magic powder. You found the trail in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF6_SZ_F1]. Wizabo, the wise man of the tower, must have stayed there.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_DF6_SensoryArea_Q20527b
string.body: Weak Spell Trail;Traces of Agent Peregran's magic powder. You found the trail in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF6_SZ_H2]. Wizabo, the wise man of the tower, must have stayed there.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_DF6_SensoryArea_Q20527c
string.body: Clear Spell Trail;Traces of Agent Peregran's magic powder. You found the trail in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF6_SZ_B1]. Wizabo, the wise man of the tower, must have stayed there.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_DF6_SensoryArea_Q20528a
string.body: Sphiros Hideout;A place where [%dic:STR_DIC_OBJ_DF6_FOBJ_Bling_Treasure_Q20528a] is hidden. It can be found in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF6_SZ_B2] in Nosra.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_DF6_SensoryArea_Q20528b
string.body: Concealed Sky Island;A sky island on which a protection artefact is secretly being crafted. It can only be reached using the [%dic:STR_DIC_OBJ_DF6_FOBJ_Transport_Device_Q20528a].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDEternity_02
string.body: Garden of Knowledge;It served as a base for observing Atreia and creating records. The entrance can be found in Lakrum.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDEternity_02_SZ_B
string.body: Alras Garten;It is suspected that this location was used to observe Atreia. Now, it is partially destroyed.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDEternity_02_SZ_C_Boss
string.body: Vid's Hidden Library;This is home to the Water Jotun, one of the administrators of the All-Knowing Tree. He guards critical documents about Piton.

string.name: STR_DIC_IDLUNA_SIEGE
string.body: Mechanerk's Weapons Factory;A factory owned by [%dic:STR_DIC_IDLUNA_SIEGE_S2_Nepilim_Fi_N_Ah_01]. Destructive machines are manufactured here, which Madrunerk wants to use to realise his sinister plans.

string.name: STR_DIC_IDLUNA_DEF
string.body: Hell Pass;The final bastion against the advancing army of the undead, who have been created by [%dic:STR_DIC_N_IDLuna_def_Stein]. Only you stand between Atreia and the virus that is constantly spreading.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDTransform
string.body: Rift of Oblivion;A distorted Rift that appeared suddenly in Atreia. Lots of research troops have tried to find out more about it...but none of them can remember anything that happened at this mysterious place.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDTransform_SZ_A_01
string.body: Orkia Observatory Forecourt;The space in front of the Observatory that protected the Aetheric Field around the Tower of Eternity at the time of the peace negotiations and was once part of a city in ancient Atreia.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDTransform_SZ_B_01
string.body: Ruins of Orkia Fortress;Ruins of the fortress that surrounded the Orkia Observatory. It fell victim to an attack by the Drakan Special Units.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDTransform_SZ_C_01
string.body: Orkia Tower Top;The highest point of the Orkia Observatory. The special units of the Drakan once invaded this far.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDTransform_SZ_C_02
string.body: Seal Seat of Memory;The place where Siel sealed the memories of the High Daevas directly after the Cataclysm. It is protected by the [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDTransform_Boss].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDF6_LF1
string.body: Kroban Base;The strange occurrences linked to the fragments of the Tower of Eternity have caused the Dark Poeta to relocate.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDF6_Lap
string.body: Elemental Lord's Laboratory;The strange occurrences linked to the fragments of the Tower of Eternity have caused the Theobomos Lab to relocate.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDF6_Adma
string.body: Adma Ruins;The strange occurrences linked to the fragments of the Tower of Eternity have caused the Adma Stronghold to relocate.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDF6_Dragon
string.body: Arkhal's Hideout;The strange occurrences linked to the fragments of the Tower of Eternity have caused the Draupnir Cave to relocate.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDLC1_Dreadgion
string.body: Sanctum Battlefield;Sanctum is under attack by the Dredgion fleet. It belongs to the 39th Prigga Legion of Ereshkigal. The battle is raging between the Elyos and the Balaur.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDDC1_Dreadgion
string.body: Pandaemonium Battlefield;Pandaemonium is under attack by the Dredgion fleet. It belongs to the 39th Prigga Legion of Ereshkigal. Battle rages between the Asmodians and the Balaur.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDTM_Lobby_01
string.body: Golden Crucible;This Crucible remained concealed for ages until a Shugo from the Red Sand Conglomerate discovered and began to run it.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDTM_Arena_01
string.body: Gold Arena;This is where duels are fought irrespective of faction. The Gold Arena is run by a Shugo from the Red Sand Conglomerate.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDEternity_War_Center
string.body: Refuge of Beginning;A Jotun refuge in the centre of Neviwind Canyon.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDEternity_War_East
string.body: Eastern Neviwind Canyon;Includes the Anvil of Immortality and the Anvil of Eternity.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDEternity_War_West
string.body: Western Neviwind Canyon;Includes the northern and southern caves.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDEternity_War_Habitat_01
string.body: Unused

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDEternity_War_Habitat_02
string.body: Unused

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDEternity_War_Cave_01
string.body: Northern Cave;A cave in the north-western part of Neviwind Canyon. You hear a voice calling from within for help.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDEternity_War_Cave_02
string.body: Southern Cave;A cave in the south-western part of Neviwind Canyon. You hear a voice calling from within for help.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDEternity_War
string.body: Neviwind Canyon;The city of the ancient Jotuns, which was destroyed by the influence of the Core Fragment.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDAb1_Ere
string.body: Narakkalli;They say that many Daevas who were abducted after the invasion by the Prigga Dredgion are held prisoner here. Can be found in Lakrum.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDAb1_Ere_04
string.body: Sakra Prison Camp;The prison where the abducted Daevas are held captive. Located in the interior of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDAb1_Ere].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDAb1_Ere_22
string.body: Chamber of Guidance;Director Mahorosh's room, which leads to the Sakra Prison Camp. Located in the interior of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDAb1_Ere].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDAb1_Ere_32
string.body: Passage to the Tranquil Path;A windstream that connects the Sakra Prison Camp with the Tranquil Terrarium. Located in the interior of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDAb1_Ere].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDAb1_Ere_34
string.body: Tranquil Path;This path connects the Sakra Prison Camp with the Altar of Tranquillity. Located in the interior of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDAb1_Ere].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDAb1_Ere_35
string.body: Sakrapes' Roots;An area completely blocked off by the roots of the huge Sakrapes. Located in the interior of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDAb1_Ere].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDAb1_Ere_36
string.body: Altar of Tranquillity;An area where the four Fallusha's want to make Sakrapes grow with their magic. Located in the interior of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDAb1_Ere].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDAb1_Ere_Entrance
string.body: Destination of the Prigga Dredgion;The place where the Prigga Dredgion landed following the invasion. This is where the entrance to [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDAb1_Ere] can be found.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDEternity_War_named_12
string.body: Jotun Garden;A garden in the eastern part of the Refuge of Beginning. It's still more or less in good shape.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDEternity_War_named_6
string.body: Remnant Altar;An altar in the western part of the Refuge of Beginning. It only vaguely still resembles an altar.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDEternity_03
string.body: Museum of Knowledge;This region can be entered using the Artefact of Knowledge in the Tower of Eternity. This is where the sum of all knowledge about the world of Aion is collected, categorised, published or destroyed.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDEternity_02_SZ_Boss
string.body: Library of Counsel;A library located in the centre of the Museum of Knowledge. This is where all knowledge about the world of Aion is stored.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_SZ_LF4_M_01
string.body: 101st Garrison - Trailblazer's Blessing;A conquerable garrison in Wildheart Grove in Inggison. This is where the artefact 'Trailblazer's Blessing' can be found.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_SZ_LF4_M_02
string.body: 102nd Garrison - Trailblazer's Blessing;A conquerable garrison in Phanoe Valley in Inggison. This is where the artefact 'Trailblazer's Blessing' can be found.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_SZ_LF4_M_03
string.body: 103rd Garrison - The Hand of Bitter Battle;A conquerable garrison in the Marut Mountains in Inggison. This is where the artefact 'The Hand of Bitter Battle' can be found.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_SZ_LF4_M_04
string.body: 104th Garrison - The Hand of Bitter Battle;A conquerable garrison on Mephistis Farm in Inggison. This is where the artefact 'The Hand of Bitter Battle' can be found.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_SZ_LF4_M_05
string.body: 105th Garrison - The Hand of Bitter Battle;A conquerable garrison in Weeping Valley in Inggison. This is where the artefact 'The Hand of Bitter Battle' can be found.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_SZ_LF4_M_06
string.body: 106th Garrison - Battlefield Encouragement;A conquerable garrison in the Forest of Antiquity in Inggison. This is where the artefact 'Battlefield Encouragement' can be found.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_SZ_LF4_M_07
string.body: 107th Garrison - Battlefield Encouragement;A conquerable garrison on the Hanarkand Plains in Inggison. This is where the artefact 'Battlefield Encouragement' can be found.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_SZ_DF4_M_01
string.body: 201st Garrison - Trailblazer's Blessing;A conquerable garrison at Gelkmaros Falls. This is where the artefact 'Trailblazer's Blessing' can be found.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_SZ_DF4_M_02
string.body: 202nd Garrison - Trailblazer's Blessing;A conquerable garrison at Antagor Battlefield in Gelkmaros. This is where the artefact 'Trailblazer's Blessing' can be found.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_SZ_DF4_M_03
string.body: 203rd Garrison - The Hand of Bitter Battle;A conquerable garrison at Nunglark Ruins in Gelkmaros. This is where the artefact 'The Hand of Bitter Battle' can be found.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_SZ_DF4_M_04
string.body: 204th Garrison - The Hand of Bitter Battle;A conquerable garrison at Farbin Camp in Gelkmaros. This is where the artefact 'The Hand of Bitter Battle' can be found.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_SZ_DF4_M_05
string.body: 205th Garrison - The Hand of Bitter Battle;A conquerable garrison in the Marayas Wilds in Gelkmaros. This is where the artefact 'The Hand of Bitter Battle' can be found.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_SZ_DF4_M_06
string.body: 206th Garrison - Battlefield Encouragement;A conquerable garrison in the north of Vorgaltem Battlefield in Gelkmaros. This is where the artefact 'Battlefield Encouragement' can be found.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_SZ_DF4_M_07
string.body: 207th Garrison - Battlefield Encouragement;A conquerable garrison in the south of Vorgaltem Battlefield in Gelkmaros. This is where the artefact 'Battlefield Encouragement' can be found.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDAbRe_Core_03
string.body: Mirash Refuge;A place frequented by the Ancient Fallushas who follow Ereshkigal. The entrance can be found in Lakrum.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_SZ_IDAbre_Core_03_A1_04
string.body: Soul Icon Storeroom;Used to store Soul Icons. Protected by the Soul Icon Wardstone. Can be found in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDAbRe_Core_03].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_SZ_IDAbre_Core_03_B1_02
string.body: Altar of Restoration;Here the Soul Icons are restored by the Fallushas' magic. Can be found in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDAbRe_Core_03].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDAb1_Heroes
string.body: Holy Tower;In the heart of the Divine Fortress, this tower serves as the seat and symbol of the Ereshkigal Legion’s power.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDEvent_Def
string.body: Hell Pass;This place has been poisoned by polluted sewage and is full of the corrupted souls of Daevas. Corpsewaker Woodush can be found there.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_Ab1_anchorage_L
string.body: Freedom Wings' Fleet Anchor Spot;The Elyos fleet lies at anchor here. When the time comes to conquer the Divine Fortress, you can reach it via the Eye of Reshanta Corridor in Lakrum.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_Ab1_anchorage_D
string.body: Chaos Envoys' Fleet Anchor Spot;The Asmodian fleet lies at anchor here. When the time comes to conquer the Divine Fortress, you can reach it via the Eye of Reshanta Corridor in Lakrum.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_SZ_LF6_Art_S1
string.body: 108th Garrison - Battlefield Encouragement;A conquerable garrison on the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF6_SZ_B2] in Nosra. This is where the artefact 'Battlefield Encouragement' can be found.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_SZ_LF6_Art_S2
string.body: 109th Garrison - The Hand of Bitter Battle;A conquerable garrison in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF6_SZ_D] in Inggison. This is where the artefact 'The Hand of Bitter Battle' can be found.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_SZ_LF6_Art_S3
string.body: 110th Garrison - Battlefield Encouragement;A conquerable garrison at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF6_SZ_F2] in Esterra. This is where the artefact 'Battlefield Encouragement' can be found.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_SZ_LF6_Art_S4
string.body: 111th Garrison - The Hand of Bitter Battle;A conquerable garrison in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF6_SZ_H2] in Esterra. This is where the artefact 'The Hand of Bitter Battle' can be found.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_SZ_DF6_Art_S1
string.body: 208th Garrison - Battlefield Encouragement;A conquerable garrison in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF6_SZ_B2] in Nosra. This is where the artefact 'Battlefield Encouragement' can be found.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_SZ_DF6_Art_S2
string.body: 209th Garrison - The Hand of Bitter Battle;A conquerable garrison in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF6_SZ_D] in Nosra. This is where the artefact 'The Hand of Bitter Battle' can be found.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_SZ_DF6_Art_S3
string.body: 210th Garrison - Battlefield Encouragement;A conquerable garrison in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF6_SZ_F2] in Nosra. This is where the artefact 'Battlefield Encouragement' can be found.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_SZ_DF6_Art_S4
string.body: 211th Garrison - The Hand of Bitter Battle;A conquerable garrison in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF6_SZ_H1] in Nosra. This is where the artefact 'The Hand of Bitter Battle' can be found.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDRun
string.body: Treasure Island of Courage;An unknown island discovered by Gogoshunerk. It holds countless and mysterious treasures, but is also surrounded by a dangerous energy.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDNovice
string.body: Haramel;This is where the fallen Daeva Hamerun brainwashed the Dukaki Kobolds of Elysea and the Skurv of Asmodae to force them to process Odium and Odella.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF3
string.body: Heiron;The Superus civilisation once flourished here. A permit is required to enter this place, which is why it is also called "Forbidden Earth".

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDLF3Lp
string.body: Aetherogenetics Lab;A research station constructed by the Lepharist Revolutionaries in the north-west of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3]. The Rotrons and Reapers of the Deathsong Forest were created there.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF5_SZ_Q62218
string.body: Mossy Forest Path;Forest Rotrons and Rock Shell Ribbits live there. The Beritra Army, which plans to destroy the Aetheric Field, can be found there. This is causing problems for the Archaeological Expedition.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDSeal_60
string.body: Makarna;This was Beritra's final destination. Translated from the Balaur language, the name means "forbidden holy place".

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDTiamat_SZ_T1_60
string.body: Tiamat's Hideout;Where the Balaur Lady Tiamat can be found. You can access it using the[%dic:STR_DIC_OBJ_IDTiamat_2_F5_FOBJ_Entrance_60].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF5_SZ_ID_01_60
string.body: Misty Abyss;This is home to the[%dic:STR_DIC_OBJ_IDTiamat_2_F5_FOBJ_Entrance_60] that contains the remains of the 5th Balaur Lady Tiamat.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF5_SZ_ID_03_60
string.body: Fortress Ruins;The[%dic:STR_DIC_OBJ_IDSeal_F5_FOBJ_Entrance] which show how the 4th Dragon Lord Beritra's plot was foiled.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF5_SZ_OP_03_a
string.body: Redwood Valley;[%dic:STR_DIC_N_LF5_DreamReader_E], the third of the three sisters of dream reading, is waiting for [%username] here.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDF7_Weapon
string.body: Prometun's Workshop;Blacksmith Prometun's workshop which is currently occupied by the Ereshkigal Legion. You can get there via the [%dic:STR_DIC_E_OBJ_IDF7_Weapon_Entrance].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_ZONE_NAME_IDF7_Weapon_A
string.body: Workshop Entrance;The entrance to [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDF7_Weapon].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_ZONE_NAME_IDF7_Weapon_B
string.body: Rim Ore Store;The place used to store ore plundered in Lakrum. Ereshkigal's Dragonbound protects it.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_ZONE_NAME_IDF7_Weapon_D
string.body: Rim Ore Storeroom;The place where the rim ore brought from the store is kept. It is protected by Captains Yarkhan and Barkhan from the 39th Legion.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_ZONE_NAME_IDF7_Weapon_F
string.body: Rim Ore Mill;The place where the rim ore is crushed to make it easier to process. It is managed by Kelsh, the Supervisor of the 39th Legion.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_ZONE_NAME_IDF7_Weapon_G
string.body: Prometun's Workplace;The excellent blacksmith Prometun's workplace. He was overpowered by the Ereshkigal Legion and imprisoned.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_ZONE_NAME_IDF7_Weapon_J
string.body: Rim Ore Blast Furnace;This is where the molten rim ore that was previously crushed is located. Tarukkan, the Leader of the 39th Legion, manages this location.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_ZONE_NAME_IDF7_Weapon_J_01
string.body: Bellows Wind Passage;This passage connects the furnace in Prometun's workshop to the blast furnace. It can be used once Tarukkan, the Leader of the 39th Legion, has been defeated.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_ZONE_NAME_IDF7_Weapon_K
string.body: Prometun's Furnace;This is where the rim ore is melted down to make various items. This place is currently occupied by Brigade General Prigga of the Ereshkigal Legion.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_SZ_LDF7_Art_01
string.body: 121st Garrison;A post in Lakrum that can be occupied. This is where the artefact "Trailblazer's Blessing" can be found.

string.body: Shady Forest;A coniferous forest which occupies a large area in front of Lakrum Fortress.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF7_SZ_E1
string.body: Lakrum Fortress;A fortress in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF7_SZ_E]. A door here leads to the Great Temple of the Jotun.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF7_SZ_E2
string.body: Outpost of the 39th Legion;This is the Outpost of the 39th Legion in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF7_SZ_E].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF7_SZ_F
string.body: Temple of Endorim;This temple was constructed by the Jotuns from Lakrum. It was used for electing elders or when important decisions had to be made.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF7_SZ_F1
string.body: Endorim Chamber;The Jotuns from Lakrum created this place to make important decisions in secret.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF7_SZ_F2
string.body: Gateway to the Temple of Endorim;A gate which must be passed on the way to the[%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF7_SZ_F].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF7_SZ_G
string.body: Cruel Coastline;Intense fighting occurred here when the Elyos and Asmodians advanced to Lakrum.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF7_SZ_G1
string.body: Sentry of the 39th Legion;A Sentry of the 39th Prigga Legion on the[%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF7_SZ_G].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF7_SZ_G2
string.body: Gloomy Silent Cave;A cave on the[%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF7_SZ_G]. It is very dark and quiet inside.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF7_SZ_LOP1
string.body: Everlasting Life Refuge;This temple was constructed by the Jotuns from Lakrum. The Elyos who invaded Lakrum use it as a base.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF7_SZ_LOP2
string.body: Heavenly Lights Garrison;The place where Agent Weda and the Heavenly Lights are stationed. They ought to help to defeat Ereshkigal.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF7_SZ_LOP3
string.body: Guardians Outpost;The Elyos built this outpost in order to occupy the Great Temple of Lakrum.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF7_SZ_DOP1
string.body: Temple of Perpetual Wisdom;This temple was constructed by the Jotuns from Lakrum. The Asmodians who invaded Lakrum use it as a base.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF7_SZ_DOP2
string.body: Shadowbringers Garrison;Agent Peregran and the Shadowbringers are stationed here. They ought to help to defeat Ereshkigal.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF7_SZ_DOP3
string.body: Archon Outpost;The Asmodians built this outpost in order to occupy the Great Temple of Lakrum.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF7
string.body: Lakrum (unused);There is a Great Temple here which contains a relic imbued with some of Aion's strength. This place had long been forgotten, which is why plants can be found here which have changed over time due to the influence of the relic.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDSeal_F2P
string.body: Makarna of Bitterness;Translated from the Balaur language, the name means "forbidden holy place". They still remember the past here, as this is where Fregion sealed the Dragon Lord Ereshkigal.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_DF5_SZ_OP_03_a
string.body: Mysterious Ruins;Drinde, a Daeva of Psychic Arts, is waiting there for [%username].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_SZ_DF4_A1_Under
string.body: Destroyed Drana Farm;The Balaur Drana Farm in the south of Gelkmaros Fortress.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDCubic
string.body: Kubrinerk's Cube Laboratory;Kubrinerk researched the cube here before it was occupied by Malarkin's followers, the Shulacks. The laboratory can be accessed with help from the [%dic:STR_DIC_N_IDCubic_Entrance] when the Lakrum Garrison is occupied.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDCubic_Enter
string.body: Entrance to the Destroyed Laboratory;The entrance to [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDCubic].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDCubic_Outside
string.body: Laboratory Area;This path connects the entrance to [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDCubic] with the laboratory. The place is currently swarming with Malarkin's followers, the Shulacks.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDCubic_Office
string.body: Lost Cube Laboratory;Kubrinerk was researching the cube in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDCubic] until it was occupied by Malarkin's followers, the Shulacks.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDF7_Ere
string.body: Senekta;This ancient refuge harbours the sacred treasure of the Jotun. It can be found underneath Lakrum Fortress.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDBattle_Change
string.body: Illumiel;One of Lady Lumiel's illusions used to train Asmodian Daevas. Presently, the Elyos Life Debt Legion and the Asmodian Wise Judgement Legion are facing off.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF4_SZ_B9
string.body: Marut Mountains;Mountains known to be rugged and craggy. The stone quarried here is used to build outposts.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF8
string.body: Dumaha;A new region in Balaurea which was discovered by the [%dic:STR_DIC_E_Stella_Industry]. Apsu used to reign over the region, but after Tiamat killed him and ascended to become the new Dragon Lord it was devastated and lost to history.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF8_SZ_LOP
string.body: Outpost[pl:"Outposts"] of Victory;An Elyos Garrison erected in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF8] with the help of the [%dic:STR_DIC_E_Stella_Industry].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF8_SZ_DOP
string.body: Outpost[pl:"Outposts"] of Florescence;An Asmodian Garrison erected in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF8] with the help of the [%dic:STR_DIC_E_Stella_Industry].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF8_SZ_B1
string.body: Gentle Highlands;A region in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF8] dominated by rolling hills. [%dic:STR_DIC_E_Rega] Territory.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF8_SZ_B2
string.body: Edoma Mountain;Rocky hills in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF8] plains region. [%dic:STR_DIC_E_Rega] Territory.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF8_SZ_B3
string.body: Rega Garrison[pl:"Garrisons"];Covers both the highlands and the plains region of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF8]. This is the location of the garrison of the new Balaur Association, the [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_E_Rega].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF8_SZ_D
string.body: Western Suhara;Private property of the [%dic:STR_DIC_E_Stella_Industry]. The [%dic:STR_DIC_E_Naki6] stocks which are distributed in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF8] are administered here. Located south of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF8_SZ_OP1].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF8_SZ_E
string.body: Wasteland of Penance;An arid desert region in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF8]. It is the dominion of the Snuwa, who serve the former Dragon Lord, Apsu.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF8_SZ_F
string.body: Sand Squall;An area in central [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF8]. Enormous amounts of sand disappear into a bottomless abyss here.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF8_SZ_G1
string.body: Outlaw North;The northern part of the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF8_SZ_G_All]. This region is attracting more and more bandits, which is why there is no law and order here.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF8_SZ_G2
string.body: Outlaw South;The southern part of the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF8_SZ_G_All]. This region is attracting more and more bandits, which is why there is no law and order here.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF8_SZ_K1
string.body: Brodelgeysir;A volcanic region in South-East [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF8]. Thermal sources can be found in some regions.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF8_SZ_K2
string.body: Exitus Camp;A volcanic region in South-West [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF8]. [%dic:STR_DIC_E_Rega] survivors have settled in this region.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF8_SZ_K3
string.body: Drytongue;A lava region in Southern [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF8]. The active volcano still spews lava.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF8_SZ_K4
string.body: Ashwind Cliff;A volcanic valley in Southern [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF8]. The volcano smoke still hasn't dissipated.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF8_SZ_OP1
string.body: Stellusia;Main base which the [%dic:STR_DIC_E_Stella_Industry] erected in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF8] for investigations and excavations. This region is the starting point for the development of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF8]. Asmodians and Elyos have reached the base.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF8_SZ_F_L_Mission
string.body: Temporary NK Unit;A laboratory which the [%dic:STR_DIC_E_Stella_Industry] closed following a series of failed experiments. Can be found in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF8_SZ_F].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF8_SZ_F_D_Mission
string.body: Temporary NK Laboratory;A laboratory which the [%dic:STR_DIC_E_Stella_Industry] closed following a series of failed experiments. Can be found in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF8_SZ_F].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF8_SZ_E_L_Mission
string.body: Chieftain Bemnu's Settlement;This is where the Snuwa Chieftain Bemnu lives; he was declared an enemy of the Stella Corporation after stealing Nakisix.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF8_SZ_E_D_Mission
string.body: Chieftain Amnu's Settlement;This is where the Snuwa Chieftain Amnu lives; he was declared an enemy of the Stella Corporation after stealing Nakisix.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDF8_Mssion01
string.body: Rega Headquarters;The hidden [%dic:STR_DIC_E_Rega] Headquarters. [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF8_Mission_Drakan_Boss_03_Al], leader of the Rega, and his followers live here.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDF8_Mssion02
string.body: Vishaka's Hideout;The place where [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF8_Mission_Drakan_Boss_03_Al], leader of the Rega, and his Defence Troop can be found.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDF8_Mission03
string.body: Secret NK Institute;The best-kept secret of the [%dic:STR_DIC_E_Stella_Industry]. The institute is responsible for developing and manufacturing [%dic:STR_DIC_E_Naki6]. The [%dic:STR_DIC_E_Lord_Legacy] which was discovered in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF8] is also researched here.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF8_SZ_OP1_Rest
string.body: Gate of Satisfaction;A Welfare Institute set up by the [%dic:STR_DIC_E_Stella_Industry] in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF8_SZ_OP1]. According to the corporation, this establishment was set up to provide food and shelter to needy Sapiens.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF8_SZ_G_All
string.body: Outlaw Region;A region which is home to a lot of crooks and criminals. Evil reigns here and nobody can do anything about it. Nobody goes there by choice, because it's just too dangerous.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_Inanna_Inside_In
string.body: Inanna's Consciousness;Consciousness separated from Inanna, which lies deep inside. It's made up of unhappy memories of her past. Her soul seems to be trapped inside and can't get out.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDF8_Mission03_Step4
string.body: Materials Warehouse;A storeroom where the main components of Nakisix are stored. Can be found in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDF8_Mission03].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDF8_Mission03_Step5
string.body: Experimental Laboratory;A laboratory to improve the quality and maximise the effects of Nakisix. Can be found in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDF8_Mission03].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDF8_Mission03_Step7
string.body: Processing Laboratory;A laboratory in which the force is extracted from the main components in the Materials Warehouse and processed. The highly refined power and the remnants are separated and conveyed through a pipeline. Can be found in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDF8_Mission03].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDF8_Mission03_Step8
string.body: Quarantine Sector;The sector in which the test subjects for the experimental laboratory are locked away. Can be found in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDF8_Mission03].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDF8_Mission03_Step9
string.body: Secret Chamber;A secret room hidden in the Quarantine Sector. A number of the Balaur's test subjects, whose purpose is a mystery, are stored here.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDF8_Mission03_Step11
string.body: Site of the Incident;Nobody knows what the room is used for but one thing is certain: it's important!

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF8_SZ_A1
string.body: Valley of the Blessed;A region of cliffs in North-West [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF8].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF8_SZ_A2
string.body: Foot of Edoma Mountain;A region in North [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF8]. There are tall trees, a cliff and a waterfall here.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF8_SZ_A3
string.body: Fragments of Lament;An area of cliffs in North-West [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF8].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF8_SZ_C1
string.body: Suhara Gorge;A region on the border between the plains and the desert of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF8]. There are tall cliffs here.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF8_SZ_C2
string.body: Eastern Suhara;A small oasis at the edge of the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF8] desert.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF8_SZ_H
string.body: Pupuru Waterfall;An area in Eastern [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF8]. Pupuru lives here.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF8_SZ_I
string.body: Desert Relics Excavation Site;An area in South-West [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF8]. There are a lot of relics of Apsu here, so it is worth investigating the area more closely.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF8_SZ_J1
string.body: Volcanic Relics Excavation Site;An area in South-East [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF8]. A lot of relics of Apsu are buried here, so it is an ideal place for research.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF8_SZ_J2
string.body: High Priest Dunu's Hideout;An area in South-East [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF8]. Nothing is known about this region because it has yet to be researched.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF8_SV_5021
string.body: 1st Altar;An altar erected by the Snuwa in honour of Apsu. Can be found in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF8].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF8_SV_5022
string.body: 2nd Altar;An altar erected by the Snuwa in honour of Apsu. Can be found in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF8].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF8_SV_5023
string.body: 3rd Altar;An altar erected by the Snuwa in honour of Apsu. Can be found in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF8].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF8_SV_5024
string.body: 4th Altar;An altar erected by the Snuwa in honour of Apsu. Can be found in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF8].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF8_SV_5025
string.body: 5th Altar;An altar erected by the Snuwa in honour of Apsu. Can be found in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF8].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF8_SV_5026
string.body: 6th Altar;An altar erected by the Snuwa in honour of Apsu. Can be found in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF8].

string.body: 7th Altar;An altar erected by the Snuwa in honour of Apsu. Can be found in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF8].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF8_SV_5028
string.body: 8th Altar;An altar erected by the Snuwa in honour of Apsu. Can be found in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF8].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF8_SV_5029
string.body: 9th Altar;An altar erected by the Snuwa in honour of Apsu. Can be found in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF8].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF8_SV_5030
string.body: 10th Altar;An altar erected by the Snuwa in honour of Apsu. Can be found in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF8].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF8_SV_5031
string.body: 11th Altar;An altar erected by the Snuwa in honour of Apsu. Can be found in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF8].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF8_SZ_OP2
string.body: Sand Castle Research Centre;A base in which relics from the Dumaha Desert Region are examined. Located in South-West Dumaha.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF8_SZ_OP3
string.body: Volcanic Ash Research Centre;A base in which relics from the Dumaha Volcano Region are examined. Located in South-East Dumaha.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDLDF8_Lab
string.body: Stella Development Laboratory;A laboratory in which Nakisix is produced. Something must have happened there because all contact to the laboratory has been cut off. Can be found at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF8_SZ_D_IDLDF8].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDLDF8_Lab_Top_Floor
string.body: Top floor of the Stella Development Laboratory;There is a laboratory on this floor. It is currently closed and secured by an alarm. Can be found in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDLDF8_Lab].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_STR_IDLDF8_Lab_SZ_D1
string.body: Laboratory 61;A laboratory where [%dic:STR_DIC_E_Stella_Industry] conducts highly unethical investigations into Nakisix. It is currently closed and secured by an alarm. The [%dic:STR_DIC_M_BIDLDF8_LAB_Boss_04_80_Ah] is imprisoned here.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_STR_IDLDF8_Lab_SZ_A1
string.body: Waste Disposal Centre;The place where the toxic waste from the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDLDF8_Lab] is disposed of. Can be found in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDLDF8_Lab].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_STR_IDLDF8_Lab_SZ_C3
string.body: NK Laboratory;A laboratory where experiments are carried out on new [%dic:STR_DIC_E_Stella_Industry] products. Can be found in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDLDF8_Lab].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_STR_IDLDF8_Lab_SZ_B3
string.body: Product Laboratory;Laboratory which researches products for the [%dic:STR_DIC_E_Stella_Industry] before bringing them onto the market. Can be found in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDLDF8_Lab].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_STR_IDLDF8_Lab_SZ_B2
string.body: Food Stores;[%dic:STR_DIC_E_Naki6_K] stocks are stored and administered here to sell them on the market. Can be found in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDLDF8_Lab].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_STR_IDLDF8_Lab_SZ_C2
string.body: NK Production Laboratory;A laboratory where the [%dic:STR_DIC_E_Stella_Industry] produces Nakisix. If there are any problems, the laboratory can self-destruct to prevent secret information about materials and manufacturing processes from getting out. Can be found in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDLDF8_Lab].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_STR_IDLDF8_Lab_SZ_C1
string.body: 2nd Floor Corridor;The corridor on the second floor of the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDLDF8_Lab].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_STR_LDF8_SZ_1921
string.body: Dumaha Fortress[pl:"Fortresses"];A fortress in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF8].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF8_SZ_B3_Lega
string.body: Rega Guard Post[pl:"Posts"];A guard post to monitor the garrison of the new Balaur Association, [%dic:STR_DIC_E_Rega].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF8_SZ_D_IDLDF8
string.body: Stella Industrial Site;An industrial site in South [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF8]. The Stella Corporation buildings and factories are located here.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF8_SZ_K1_L_MissionSpot01
string.body: Inanna's Sanctuary;The place where [%dic:STR_DIC_N_LDF8_K_Inanna_L_E] is hiding. Can be found at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF8_SZ_K1].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF8_SZ_K1_D_MissionSpot01
string.body: Inanna's Hideout;The place where [%dic:STR_DIC_N_LDF8_K_Inanna_D_E] is hiding. Can be found at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF8_SZ_K1].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDF8_Mission04
string.body: Shadow of Suffering;The place where Inanna and Beninerk met for the first time. Inanna was held captive and tortured here by the remaining Balaur soldiers.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF8_SZ_K1_MissionSpot02
string.body: Prisoner Valley;A prison camp controlled by the [%dic:STR_DIC_E_Rega] soldiers, who have wandered south. Many weak Sapiens are being kept here as slaves. Can be found at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF8_SZ_K1].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDF8_House
string.body: Beninerk's Manor;The estate belonging to Beninerk, General of the Stella Corporation. Beninerk holds a celebration here for Daevas who work for the Stella Corporation. You can reach the premises with [%dic:STR_DIC_N_IDF8_House_Entrance]'s help.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_SZ_LDF8_fightClub_1
string.body: Orbis Training Arena;An arena used to train employees of the Stella Corporation. It can be found in the cellar of Stellusia. Follow the path behind the teleporter to get there.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_STR_LDF5a_SZ_B6_1
string.body: Sunken Valley;A valley that is no longer accessible for some unknown reason.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_STR_LDF5b_SZ_A3_2
string.body: Whistling Valley;The wind blowing through this valley results in a striking whistle sound.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_STR_LDF5b_SZ_A3_3
string.body: End of the Snowfield;The edge of the snowfield.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_STR_LDF5b_SZ_E1_2
string.body: Goldrinyerk District;A neutral zone in South Katalam that belongs to Goldrinyerk Limited.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_STR_LDF5b_SZ_F1
string.body: Southern Beritra Front;A defence line in the south along which the battle against Beritra rages.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_STR_LDF5b_SZ_F1_1
string.body: Northern Beritra Front;A defence line in the north along which the battle against Beritra rages.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_SZ_IDF8_M4_2
string.body: Engine Room of Suffering;A room inside the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDF8_Mission04]. Technically gifted slaves are developing weapons here.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_SZ_IDF8_M4_7
string.body: Grievance Bridge;A bridge in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDF8_Mission04]. You must cross the bridge to reach the way out.
